entries: Abjurers是专业的巫师，他们在层层魔法力量的守护下感到安全。国王、贵族和其他富有的人通常会雇佣堕落者对他们的家和金库施以保护性的咒语。
追求奥术魔法的心灵传播者被当作异类放逐，对他们来说，不可能与长者的大脑进行永恒的交流。通往巫术王国的道路提供了一种逃避死亡永恒的方法，但这条道路是漫长而孤独的。Alhoons是使用捷径的心灵传播者。

entries.name: Arcane Temptation
entries: Elder brains forbid mind flayers from pursuing magic power aside from psionics, but it isn't an interdiction they must often enforce. Illithids brook no masters but members of their own kind, so it isn't in their nature to bow to any god or otherworldly patron. However, wizardry remains a rare temptation.
在咒语书的书页中，illithid看到了一个获得权威的系统。通过撰写这本书的巫师的著作，illithid人看到了一个高度智慧的头脑的运作。大多数发现咒语书的幻术师的反应是憎恶或漠不关心，但对一些人来说，咒语书是通往新思维方式的大门。
有一段时间，对这种禁忌文本的研究可以瞒着其他illithids，甚至瞒着长者的大脑。对巫术的理解就像一个活物一样躲避着心灵。然而，最终，理解会到来，如果要活下来，一个掠夺心灵的奥术师必须接受自己是异类，并逃离殖民地。
面对这个可怕的现实，一群由九名心灵分裂者组成的团体用他们的奥秘魔法和幻术编织了一个新的真理。这九个人称自己为alhoon，此后，所有追随他们脚步的人都被称为同一个名字。
起初，alhoon很难与普通读心者区分开来。最明显的区别是，它没有弑心者永远存在的粘液涂层。没有这种保护，Alhoon的皮肤会变得干燥和开裂。它的眼睛可能会显得干瘪和凹陷。这两个线索都很容易被没有见过噬心者的人错过。然而，在很短的时间内，alhoon的肉体就会枯萎，其空洞的眼窝会像其他地衣一样闪耀着冰冷的针尖之光。
心灵诱捕术所赋予的不死之身只持续到所选择的活体受害者的生命。因此，带着200岁的精灵来献祭的alhoon期待着比献祭35岁的人更长久的存在。Alhoons可以通过与新的受害者重复这个仪式来延长他们的存在，有效地为自己重新设置时钟。
破坏思维陷阱的periapt会使被困在里面的人被遗忘，因此alhoons经常一起工作，对periapt和他们喜欢的仪式地点进行精心保护。有时，只有一个alhoon被委托保管思维陷阱的periapt，但这是一个危险的提议。任何持有心灵陷阱periapt的人都会在攻击、拯救和检查中对与之相关的alhoons产生优势，而这些alhoons反过来在攻击、拯救和检查中对持有者产生不利。
此外，periapt的持有者可以与被困在其中的任何牺牲的灵魂进行心灵感应，periapt中的alhoons可以与持有者进行心灵感应。携带periapt的生物不能阻止alhoons的交流，但可以让被困的灵魂安静下来。

entries.name: Existential Fear
entries: Arcanist deviants that taste freedom from the colony react in a variety of ways. Some prize their privacy, others seek to commune with similar minds, and still others seek to dominate a colony, elevating themselves to the position of leadership normally held by an elder brain. Regardless of the arcanist's personal inclinations, it faces the same stark fact: When it dies, it will not join the host of minds in the elder brain. Deviant minds are never accepted as part of the collective. For it, death means oblivion.

entries.name: Dreadful Deliverance
entries: Lichdom offers salvation and the prospect of being able to pursue knowledge indefinitely. Having feasted on the brains of people when alive, a mind flayer has no compunction about feeding souls to a phylactery. The only hindrance to a mind flayer becoming a lich is the means, which is a secret some mind flayer arcanists stop at nothing to discover. Yet lichdom requires an arcane spellcaster to be at the apex of power, something many mind flayers find is far from their grasps.

entries.name: A Psionic Secret
entries: Alhoons can cooperate in the creation of a periapt of mind trapping, a fist-sized container made of silver, emerald, and amethyst. The process requires at least three mind flayer arcanists and the sacrifice of an equal number of souls from living victims in a three-day-long ritual of spellcasting and psionic communion. Upon its completion, free-willed undeath is conferred on the mind flayers, turning them into alhoons.

entries.name: Precarious Immortality
entries: Unlike with true lichdom, the periapt of mind trapping doesn't restore the alhoons to undeath if they are destroyed. Instead, a destroyed alhoon's mind is transferred to the periapt where it remains in communion with any other trapped alhoon minds, as well as the souls of those sacrificed.
安尼斯女巫的巢穴在山区或丘陵。尽管他们是驼背和驼肩，但他们是同类中最大和最强壮的，身高达8英尺。

entries.name: Tormenting the Weak
entries: Although annis hags can easily tear a grown man apart, they love hunting children, preferring their flesh above all others. They use the flayed skin of such victims to make supple leather, and a hag's lair often shows the signs of this industry.
安尼斯女巫在森林和其他他们声称的地区的边缘留下了他们残忍的标记。通过这种方式，他们在附近的村庄和定居点挑起恐惧和偏执。对Annis hag来说，没有什么比把一个充满活力的社区变成一个被恐惧麻痹的地方更甜蜜的了，在那里，人们从不在晚上冒险，陌生人会受到怀疑和愤怒，父母会警告他们的孩子 "要乖，否则Annis会抓你"。

entries.name: Child Corrupter
entries: When an annis feels especially cruel, she disguises herself as a kindly-looking elderly woman, approaches a child in a remote place, and gives it an iron token that it can use to confide in her. Over time, "Granny" convinces the child that it's okay to have bad thoughts and do bad deeds-starting with breaking things or wandering outside without permission, then graduating to pushing someone down the stairs or setting a house on fire. Sooner or later, the child's family and community become terrified of the "bad seed" and must face the awful decision of whether the child should be punished or exiled.

entries.name: Tribe Mother
entries: Much in the way that they befriend children in order to corrupt them, annis hags have a tendency for adopting a group of ogres, trolls, or other loutish creatures, ruling them through brute strength, verbal abuse, and superstition.

entries.name: Covens
entries: An annis hag that is part of a coven (see the "Hag Covens" sidebar in the Monster Manual) has a challenge rating of 8 (3,900 XP).

entries.name: Iron Token
entries: 女巫可以拔出她的一颗铁牙或铁钉，花1分钟将其塑造成硬币、戒指或小镜子的形状。此后，任何持有这个铁质信物的生物都可以和女巫进行低声交谈，前提是该生物和女巫在同一个存在平面上，并且彼此相距10英里以内。持有令牌的人只能听到女巫的声音，而不能听到其他生物的声音或女巫周围的任何环境噪音。同样地，老巫婆也能听到令牌持有者的声音，而不是它周围的噪音。
一个巫婆在同一时间最多可以有三个铁质令牌。作为一个行动，她可以辨别她所有的活动令牌的方向和大致距离。她可以在任何距离上瞬间停用她的任何令牌（无需行动），这时令牌会保留其当前的形式，但失去其魔法属性。
学徒是为更有经验的巫师服务或上学的新手奥术施法者。他们从事琐碎的工作，如烹饪和清洁，以换取魔法方面的教育。
大德鲁伊守护着他们领域的自然奇迹。他们很少与文明人交流，除非对自然秩序有很大的威胁。大德鲁伊通常有一个或多个德鲁伊的学生（统计数字见《怪物手册》），大德鲁伊的巢穴通常由忠诚的野兽和精灵生物守护。
弓箭手保卫城堡，在文明的边缘猎取野味，在军事单位中充当炮兵，偶尔也会作为强盗或商队守卫赚些钱。

巴赫鲁（Bahgtru）是格鲁姆什（Gruumsh）和卢斯克（Luthic）的儿子，是兽人的神灵，具有不羁的力量。传说中，Bahgtru需要一匹和他一样凶猛的坐骑来打仗，所以他寻找了一头强大的牛，徒手征服了这头牛，并把它拖到了Nishrek，Gruumsh的王国。巴赫鲁给这只野兽取名为卡扎特，也就是兽语中的 "公牛"。巴赫鲁骑在卡扎特的背上，冲进战场，冲进敌人的包围圈，跃过驼鸟的犄角，落在敌人的中间。
崇尚巴格鲁的兽人可能会饲养一队战牛，带着他们参加战斗。从小就被训练成凶猛的坐骑，牛是Bahgtru的神圣象征。没有兽人会吃这种动物，它们在死亡时被当作尊贵的战士对待。
恶魔领主创造了较小的恶魔，目的是在整个多元宇宙中散布混乱和恐怖。

entries.name: Babau
entries: 恶魔和魔鬼为了争夺下层世界的控制权而无休止地发生冲突。其中一场战斗是大恶魔格拉西亚的军团与恶魔领主格拉兹兹特的尖叫群对抗。据说格拉西亚用她的剑打伤了格拉兹兹特，在他的血流到地上的地方出现了第一批巴巴人。他们的突然出现帮助击溃了格拉西亚，并确保了格拉兹兹特作为深渊中最杰出的恶魔领主之一的地位。
巴鲍尔恶魔拥有魔鬼的狡猾和恶魔的嗜血性。它有皮革般的黑色皮肤，紧紧地包裹着其憔悴的身躯，从其修长的头骨后面伸出一个弯曲的角。巴鲍的可怕目光可以削弱一个生物的力量。
班德霍布是一个影子和肉体的混合体。通过黑暗魔法，这些成分呈现出一种巨大而卑鄙的人形，类似于双足蟾蜍的形状。在这种形态下，班德霍布暂时为它的创造者服务，成为一个暴徒、小偷和绑架者。

entries.name: Birthed by Hags
entries: In the earliest days of the world, a coven of night hags devised a ritual that led to the creation of the first banderhobb. A hag that knows the ritual might be willing to teach it for the right price. Some other dark fey and powerful fiends also know of the process, as do a few mortal mages. Instructions might also be found in a tome devoted to debased wizardry.
一个Banderhobb履行其职责，直到其存在结束。当它过期时，通常是在它出生后的几天，它只留下了焦油状的粘液和一缕阴影。传说中，影子谷有一座黑暗的塔，那里的影子有时会被改造，而班德霍布则在那里游荡。

entries.name: Silent and Deadly
entries: When the ritual to create a banderhobb is complete, flesh, spirit, and shadow combine to produce a creature as big as an ogre. The newly formed monstrosity has spindly limbs that belie great strength. Its broad maw holds a long tongue and rows of fangs, both of which it uses to grab and swallow a creature or perhaps an object the banderhobb intends to steal. Despite its size, a banderhobb makes little noise, moving as silently as the shadows that infuse it. A banderhobb isn't capable of speech, but it can understand orders given to it by its creator and communicates with nearby banderhobbs in a psychic manner.

entries.name: Agents of Evil
entries: During its brief existence, a banderhobb attempts to carry out the bidding of the one who birthed it. It accomplishes its mission with no concern for the harm it suffers or creates. Its only desire is to serve and succeed. A banderhobb that is assigned to track down a target is particularly dangerous when it is provided with a lock of hair, a personal belonging, or other object connected to the target. Possession of such an item allows it to sense the creature's location from as far as a mile away.
吟游诗人是有天赋的诗人、讲故事的人和艺人，他们走得很远很远，但通常在酒馆或在冒险家、粗暴的雇佣兵和富有的赞助人的欢乐队伍中被发现。
很久以前，地精之神的主人马格卢比耶特与地府将军讨价还价，寻求援助。将军提供了为地精之神的事业而死的尤格洛特人。然而，当履行他的那部分契约的时候，马格卢比耶特却违背了协议。为了报复，地府将军创造了噬魂兽来吞噬地精的灵魂，使马格鲁比耶特在来世失去了军队的力量。

entries.name: Consumers of Souls
entries: Barghest是由地精父母所生，就像正常的后代一样。这种生物以妖精的形态出现，然后发展出拥有真正形态的能力：一只巨大的、邪恶的犬类。
每一个巴格斯特的任务都是由地府将军植入的，通过吞噬它所杀死的人的身体来吞噬17个地精的灵魂。以这种方式消耗的灵魂将被阻止加入马格鲁比耶特在阿克伦的部队。为什么是17个？因为马格鲁比耶特在与将军的契约中违背的誓言共有十七个。

Barghest渴望有一天能完成它的使命，回到地府，在他的yugoloth军团中直接为将军服务，但它不会不分青红皂白地杀死哥布林人。通过吞噬地精领袖和其他有权势的人的灵魂，而不是低级的地精，Barghest在来世赢得了更高的地位。Barghests通常对自己的真实本性保密，在有机会的时候捕食一两只妖精，直到他们达到成年年龄，老而弥坚，足以寻找更强大的猎物。当妖精们发现有一个巴吉斯特在他们中间时，他们的反应是卑躬屈膝的服从，部落的每个成员都渴望向巴吉斯特表明它不值得被吞噬。

entries.name: Banished by Fire
entries: Barghest避免接触大的、开放的火。任何比它的身体更大的火焰都会成为通往地狱的通道，并将恶魔驱逐到那个平面，在那里它很可能会因为失败而被杀死或被尤戈洛人奴役。

entries.name: Soul Feeding
entries: Barghest可以在它杀死的死了不到10分钟的人形生物的尸体上进食，在此过程中同时吞噬肉体和灵魂。这种进食至少需要1分钟，而且会摧毁受害者的身体。受害者的灵魂会被困在barghest中24小时，之后会被消化掉。如果barghest在灵魂被消化之前死亡，灵魂就会被释放。
当一个人形生物的灵魂被困在沼泽中时，任何可能起作用的复兴方式都只有{@chance 50|50 percent}的机会，如果成功的话，可以将灵魂从沼泽中释放出来。然而，一旦一个生物的灵魂被消化了，任何凡人的魔法都无法让这个人形生物恢复生命。
比厄尔女巫生活在寒冷的土地上，喜欢被雪覆盖的山脉。他们在冬季变得更加活跃，利用他们的冰雪和天气魔法使附近的定居点的生活变得悲惨。
巫婆的皮肤是蓝白色的，就像一个被冻死的人的皮肤。她的头发是苍白色的，她很憔悴，就像一个靠吃树皮和皮革过冬的人。她的眼睛很苍白，周围是深色的、青色的肉。比厄尔带着一根扭曲的灰色木杖，她可以像飞天扫帚一样骑在上面，增强她的魔力。

entries.name: Cold Hearts
entries: Bheur hags are attracted to selfish actions justified by deadly cold, such as murdering a traveler for a winter coat, chopping down a dryad's grove for firewood, and so on. These actions are especially sweet to a bheur if they are unwarranted, such as a greedy merchant hoarding more food for the winter than he could possibly eat while others starve. Bheurs love to seed such ideas and thoughts in mortals. They use their ability to manipulate weather to batter villages with snow and freezing cold, hoping to instill despair that turns the villagers against each other.
巫婆喜欢看着毫无准备的人在冬天为他们的错误受苦和死亡。她很高兴看到凡人为了生存而做出琐碎的、可悲的尝试，例如在找不到真正的食物时吃靴子和皮革碎片。

entries.name: Awful to Behold
entries: When a bheur hag is fully in the throes of combat and has recently slain one of her foes, she often forgoes a direct attack on her remaining enemies and instead takes a moment to feed on the corpse, dismembering it and tearing meat from bone. The sight of this savagery is enough to render witnesses temporarily insane.

entries.name: Covens
entries: A bheur hag that is part of a coven (see the "Hag Covens" sidebar in the Monster Manual) has a challenge rating of 9 (5,000 XP).
黑卫是违背了神圣誓言的圣骑士，现在沉溺于自己的黑暗野心。他们与恶魔和亡灵交媾，并拒绝接受他们以前生活中所有美好的东西。
波达克是崇尚奥库斯的人的不死之身。它没有生命和灵魂，只为造成死亡而存在。

entries.name: Marked by Orcus
entries: A worshiper of Orcus can take ritual vows while carving the demon lord's symbol on its chest over the heart. Orcus's power flays body, mind, and soul, leaving behind a sentient husk that sucks in all life energy near it. Most bodaks come into being in this way, then unleashed to spread death in Orcus's name.
奥克斯在深渊中用七个信徒创造了第一批波达克，他们被称为 "湮灭之神"（Hierophants of Annihilation）。这些人物，像巴洛尔一样强大，有自由意志，但直接为不死王子服务。任何一个波达克都可以用它的目光将被杀的凡人变成波达克。和每个毁灭之神一样，每个波达克都有奥库斯的标记，即胸口的伤口，一个凡人的心脏的开口。
奥库斯可以回忆起波达克看到或听到的任何东西。如果他愿意，他可以通过波达克直接对他的敌人和追随者说话。波达克是奥库斯意志在深渊之外的延伸，为恶魔王子的目标和其他爪牙服务。
甚至自然界也看不起波达克。太阳烧掉了波达克的污秽的肉体。这种生物的目光会浪费生命。任何被波达克的目光杀死的人都会枯萎，他们的脸被冻结在一个恐怖的面具中。这个怪物的存在是如此的不自然，以至于让人的灵魂感到寒冷。没有经过战争训练的动物在波达克到来之前就会本能地逃跑。

entries.name: Unhallowed Fragments
entries: A bodak retains vague impressions of its past life. It seeks out both its former allies and its former enemies to destroy them, as its warped soul seeks to erase anything connected to its former life. Minions of Orcus are the one exception to this compulsion; a bodak recognizes them as kindred souls and spares them from its wrath. Anyone who knew the individual before its transformation into a bodak can recognize mannerisms or other subtle clues to its original identity.

entries.name: Ravaged Soul
entries: The soul of a creature that becomes a bodak is so damaged that it is unfit for most forms of magical resurrection. Only a {@spell wish} spell or similar magic can return a bodak to its former life.

entries.name: Undead Nature
entries: A bodak doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Boggles是童话故事中的小妖怪。它们潜伏在精灵世界的边缘地带，在物质世界也能找到，它们藏在床底下和壁橱里，等待着用它们的恶作剧来吓唬和困扰人们。
Boggle是在孤独感中诞生的，在Feywild接触世界的地方出现，接近一个感到被孤立或被遗弃的智能生物。例如，一个被遗弃的孩子可能无意中变出一个博格，并将其视为一种想象中的朋友。博格也可能出现在一个孤独的鳏夫家的阁楼上或一个隐士的山洞里。

entries.name: Irksome Pests
entries: Boggles engage in petty pranks to amuse themselves, passing the time at their hosts' expense. A boggle isn't above breaking dishes, hiding tools, making frightening sounds to startle cows and sour their milk, or hiding a baby in an attic. Although a boggle's antics might cause distress and unintentional harm, mischief-not mayhem-is usually its intent. If threatened, a boggle flees rather than stand and fight.

entries.name: Oily Excretions
entries: A boggle excretes an oil from its pores and can make its oil slippery or sticky. The oil dries up and disappears an hour later.

entries.name: Twisting Space
entries: A boggle can create magical openings to travel short distances or to pilfer items that would otherwise be beyond its reach. To create such a rift in space, a boggle must be adjacent to a space defined by a frame, such as an open window or a doorway, a gap between the bars of a cage, or the opening between the feet of a bed and the floor. The rift is invisible and disappears after a few seconds-enough time for the boggle to step, reach, or attack through it.

entries.name: Unreliable Allies
entries: A boggle makes a decent servant for a strong-willed master, and wicked creatures such as fomorians and hags sometimes shelter boggles in their lairs. Warlocks who form pacts with archfey have also been known to command boggles, and charismatic individuals who make the right offers have enjoyed temporary alliances with these little tricksters. A bored boggle always finds some way to entertain itself.
这个妖精是一个拥有野生魔法起源的巫师，他的每一次施法，包括咒语，都伴随着野生魔法的涌动。每次妖精施法时，都会伴随着野性魔法的激增；在{@book Player's Handbook|PHB}中的{@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB}表上滚动，以确定野性魔法的效果。
这个地精在一个地精巫师手下工作，偷看了它主人的法术书，并通过模仿它记忆中的手势和语言学会了一点巫术。这只地精每天可以施放一次随机决定的一级巫师法术。智力是它的法术能力。
这种地精术士服务于一个赞助人，如果地精不按承诺行事，他可以提取肉体的报酬。通常这个赞助人是作为部落老大的女巫团，一个已经进入世界的恶魔，或者一个不死的领主，如巫妖或吸血鬼。(关于不死领主赞助人的更多信息，请参见（%0%））。

monsterFluff.name: Booyahg Slave of the Great Old One

entries: 库尔戈尔巴耶格认为应该赋予这个妖精以力量，使其能够支配他人。这个小妖精有{@dice 1d3}其他小妖精奴役地听从它的命令。
这个妖精找到了一个魔法物品（一个（%0%），一个（%1%），或类似的东西），并学会了如何使用它。

entries.name: Booyahgs
entries: 妖精中的任何类型的施法者都是罕见的。妖精通常缺乏学习和练习巫术所需的智慧和耐心，即使获得了必要的训练和知识，他们的表现也很差。巫师在他们中间比许多其他种族要少，而且Khurgorbaeyag似乎不喜欢与他的信徒分享他的神力。尽管许多地精愿意提供任何东西来获得术士的能力，但授予这种力量的赞助人知道地精不太可能坚持其在任何交易中的立场。
即使一个地精生来就有成为施法者的能力，但继承传统所需的知识和天赋很少能持续超过几代。因为他们对魔法的经验太少，地精对魔法的形式不加区分。对他们来说，所有的魔法都是 "booyahg"，而且这个词是他们给任何魔法从业者的名字的一部分。
能够接触到booyahg的地精就会成为lashers的成员，并经常可以上升到老板的角色。
这种巨大的四足恐龙体型庞大，大多数捕食者都会放过它。它致命的尾巴可以赶走或杀死较小的威胁。
鲶鱼和它所生活的卑鄙的沼泽地一样令人厌恶。像这样的荒地一样，这种由臃肿的水牛、恐龙、疣猪和河马的部分组成的集合体几乎没有什么值得称赞的地方。很少有旅行者愿意穿越猫头鹰的领地。

entries.name: Animalistic Nature
entries: Despite their ungainly physiology, catoblepases resemble natural beasts. A catoblepas behaves much like an animal, too, ambling through its marshy home, munching choice vegetation, eating the occasional bit of carrion, and wallowing in mire. A catoblepas might be found with the one mate it chooses for life and, on occasion, a calf. Especially if it's guarding its young, a catoblepas attacks anyone that moves too close.

圣人说，瘟疫和腐烂之神创造了catoblepases，作为他们影响的化身。无论这种生物的起源是什么，各种故事都将catoblepas与不幸联系在一起，而其中许多故事都有真实的成分。一些这样的故事声称，女巫像照顾牛一样照顾catoblepases，而包含catoblepas的沼泽也可能是喝怪物奶水的女巫的家。虽然某只catoblepas可能与女巫没有关系，但女巫团可能会饲养一只或多只这样的野兽作为守护者或宠物。还有一些传说说，那些心地不纯的人可以驯服catoblepas。事实上，一些流传着恶毒的术士和黑暗骑士的故事，他们发现了如何驯化这些野兽并将其作为坐骑。

entries.name: Stench of Death
entries: A catoblepas's stink, like that of death mixed with swamp gas and skunk musk, gives it away as being much more ghastly than its appearance suggests. When it is on the attack, a catoblepas reveals the extent of its horrific nature. The creature's serpentine neck has trouble lifting its head, but one glare from its bloodshot eyes can rot flesh. At the end of its tail is a club that can rattle body and soul if it strikes true, leaving a victim unable to act. If the target of its attacks dies, the catoblepas feasts on the fresh remains.

entries.name: Blighted Territory
entries: A catoblepas's nature as a creature of disease and decay brings out similar characteristics in the creature's swampy habitat. Such a wetland becomes gloomy, tangled, and more fetid than it was before. Beneficial qualities of the environment, such as healing herbs and clean water, diminish when a catoblepas lives nearby. Swamp gases have a hint of the catoblepas's foulness to them. Animals in the area are more aggressive and liable to be diseased. Degenerate creatures are likely to take up residence near a catoblepas's territory, as are those seeking to avoid notice.

entries.name: Sinister Folklore
entries: Ordinary folk rarely see a catoblepas, but the creature has such a feared reputation that stories about it are ingrained in the popular culture. Any rumor of a catoblepas taking up residence nearby is taken to be a bad omen, even if the rumor is proven false. The silhouette of a catoblepas, with its tail extended over its body and its head held low, is a baleful heraldic figure signifying death or doom.
洞穴鱼人是一种地下蛛形纲动物，有一个长长的鼻子，里面有喷丝器，使该生物能够产生粘性的长丝，很像蜘蛛的网线，该生物用它来抓捕猎物。

entries.name: Ambushers
entries: A cave fisher usually hunts small animals and is fond of bats, so it stretches its filament over an opening that such prey might travel through. It then climbs to a hiding spot and adheres itself to the surface to rest and wait. When prey blunders into the filament, the cave fisher reels in its meal. A group of cave fishers might work together to cover a large area with filaments, but as soon as one captures potential food, every cave fisher in the area competes for the prize. If a victim escapes from the initial ambush, a cave fisher can reclaim its prey by shooting a filament out to capture it again.
洞穴鱼人本能地知道，像人类这样的大型目标更难战胜，因此，除非遇到单独的目标，否则这些生物对攻击这类猎物避之不及。它们可能会试着干掉一个走在一群旅行者前面的侦察员，或者一个落单的人，而不是吸引整个队伍的注意力。

entries.name: Moving Up in the World
entries: Scarce food might draw a group of cave fishers up to the surface, into a shadowy canyon or a gloomy forest that features both native animal prey and creatures such as explorers or travelers occasionally moving through the area.

entries.name: Valuable Innards
entries: Nearly every part of a cave fisher is useful after the creature has been dispatched. Its blood is alcoholic and tastes like strong liquor. Several dwarven spirits include cave fisher blood as part of the recipe, and some dwarves, especially berserkers, drink the blood straight. If they are gathered after being extruded, cave fisher filaments can be woven into rope that is thin, tough, and nearly invisible. Cave fisher meat is edible, tasting much like crab cooked in strong wine. The creature's shell is used in the manufacture of tools, armor, and jewelry.

entries.name: Reluctant Servants
entries: While some folk hunt cave fishers to kill them for their filaments and their blood, others capture cave fisher eggs and rear the hatchlings. Cave fishers have a natural aversion to fire, since their blood is flammable. As such, chitines and hobgoblins sometimes use the threat of fire to train cave fishers, then employ them to guard passages or as beasts of war.
冠军是强大的战士，他们在战争或角斗场中磨练自己的战斗技巧。对于士兵和其他以战斗为生的人来说，冠军和贵族一样有影响力，他们的存在是统治者中地位的象征。
Chitines是具有蛛形结构的多臂人形生物，为Lolth服务。他们在组织良好的群体中活动，在对抗蜘蛛魔后的敌人的战争中被证明是有效的战士。有时，洛尔兹会让奇特人与黑暗精灵对抗--尽管这两个群体都崇拜她--作为惩罚乌鸦的一种方式，因为乌鸦创造了奇特人，但这样做使他们的女神不高兴。

entries.name: Unnatural Origin
entries: Long ago, the drow first subjected elf prisoners to horrible rituals that transformed the captives into creatures with both humanoid and spider traits, which their creators dubbed chitines. The dark elves' intention was to create slaves dedicated first of all to the drow and, by association with them, to Lolth. As the drow ultimately discovered, the goddess found this arrangement unacceptable.
创造过程需要魔法学科之间的合作。鸦人的巫师和术士使用了奥术魔法和恶魔的力量，而鸦人的女祭司则祈求洛尔思的帮助，以获得确保主体生存所需的神性火花。洛尔思看着，期待着在这个过程的某个部分看到这些新的憎恶被献给她，但没有进行这样的仪式。作为对这种缺乏尊重的报复，蜘蛛女王扭曲了乌鸦的创造仪式以达到她自己的目的。

起初，乌鸦并不知道这些新生物是洛神对他们不满的标志。相反，他们很高兴，因为choldriths可以产卵，孕育出更多的chitines（和稀有的choldrith），并且可以指导chitines工作。但黑暗精灵意识到他们的错误--Choldriths属于Lolth，身体和灵魂。他们向chitines低声说起他们对蜘蛛女王的崇拜和对乌鸦的敌意，叛乱的种子就这样生根发芽，不断壮大。Chitines和choldriths奋起反抗他们未来的主人；不久之后，大多数生物都获得了自由，一些帮助繁殖和照料它们的乌鸦也死了。
如今，乌鸦在有需要的时候仍然会创造奇特的人。在choldrith存在的情况下，chitines是乌鸦的好工人，如果乌鸦发现一个独立的chitine群落并想渗透进去，它们就会很有用。不过，如果在创造过程中产生了一个choldrith，乌鸦会立即摧毁这个生物。
作为Lolth的仆人，Choldriths和Chitines喜欢蜘蛛和类似蜘蛛的生物。他们饲养蜘蛛和类似的蛛形纲动物，如洞穴鱼人。Chitine殖民地为Lolth建立了神龛，作为信标，吸引蜘蛛和其他为她服务的邪恶、野蛮的生物。凡是奇蒂纳人建立殖民地的地方，很快就会成为一个网络笼罩、阴暗和诡谲的地方。

一个殖民地可以支持许多choldriths，它们充当指挥官、祭司和监督者。这些人不断地争夺地位，尽管他们很少以使殖民地面临风险的方式相互对抗。殖民地由一个单一的主权者统治，他决定哪些殖民地成员执行哪些任务，包括她或任何其他choldrith是否被允许下蛋。如果这位最高统治者收到来自洛尔思的异象，她可能会改变她的殖民地的整个行动方向。在这种时候，chitines会从地下世界出来，定居在地表偏远、阴暗的地方，在那里它们可以向其他物种发动战争，尤其是乌鸦和精灵。

entries.name: Lolth's Revenge
entries: As the drow continued to perform the rituals, the process usually transformed the subject into the spindly, stunted creature they expected. Occasionally, though, the elf changed into a monstrosity that was more spider than elf, resembling Lolth in her spider form, and more cunning than a chitine, that the drow dubbed a choldrith.

entries.name: Lolth's Chosen
entries: Choldriths are born with a fanatical devotion to Lolth, which leads them to develop some skill in divine magic. They preach that chitines are Lolth's favored people, and that choldriths are the Spider Queen's rightful worldly representatives sent to free the chitines from slavery. Although choldriths and chitines lack sexual characteristics, and choldriths need no mate to lay eggs, these creatures choose the gender identity of their goddess. Choldriths also believe and teach that Lolth's spider form, much like that of a choldrith, is her truest shape. Any idol to Lolth in a chitine colony depicts Lolth in this way.

entries.name: Communal Spiders
entries: Chitines and choldriths resemble spiders, but they behave more like social insects such as ants. Chitines are divided into worker and warrior castes, and choldriths occupy the top levels of a colony's hierarchy. Each chitine has a social position that comes with duties related to that rank, and all chitines are expected to willingly sacrifice themselves to protect the choldriths. Every chitine has spinnerets and slowly produces webbing that is used to build floors, walls, structures, objects, and traps that benefit and protect the colony. A warrior might be responsible for crafting web armor (which is as tough as hide or leather), while a group of workers might be tasked to dig a pit trap and cover it with fragile webbing disguised with loose dirt to appear as a solid surface.

总的来说，云巨人并不信仰宗教。他们容忍许多关于他们的守护神Memnor的矛盾想法。微笑的人使这种宽容变得紧张。
笑面人是云中巨人，他们尊崇并效仿梅姆诺的狡猾和欺骗，胜过一切。他们是诡计多端的人，在追求财富的过程中使用技巧、欺骗、误导和魔法。他们还拥有不可预知的天赋和邪恶的幽默感。
虽然云巨人在与其他同类打交道时希望有一定程度的诡计和欺骗，但微笑的人在行为上超越了礼仪的界限，做的和说的都是更高贵的云巨人认为有损其尊严的事情。

entries.name: Mysterious Masks
entries: Smiling ones take their name from the strange two-faced masks they wear. The smiling half of the face often looks more like a smirk or a triumphant sneer than a pleasant grin. The frowning half represents the displeasure smiling ones feel about their place in the ordning-second to the storm giants. The masks serve as symbols of their devotion, but they also conceal their wearers' true facial expressions.
魔法师是专业的魔法师，他们从其他星球召唤生物，并凭空创造材料。一些魔法师用他们的魔法来支持军队或在战场上消灭敌人，而另一些则用召唤的生物来守护他们的巢穴。
牛有很多种类，从普通的牛到更不寻常的神奇变种。
噬心者通过用幻觉能量轰击正常的老鼠来制造颅骨老鼠。

entries.name: Evil Collectives
entries: 颅鼠并不比普通老鼠聪明，其行为也是如此。然而，如果有足够多的颅骨鼠聚集在一起形成一个鼠群，它们就会将自己的头脑与鼠群中所有成员的累积记忆融合成一个单一的智能。老鼠因此而变得更加聪明，而且只要鼠群持续存在，它们就能保持其高度的智能。鼠群还唤醒了由它的弑心者植入每只颅骨鼠体内的潜在幻觉能力，赋予鼠群类似于法术的幻觉能力。
从鼠群中分离出来的老鼠成为一只普通的颅鼠，智力为15。它与鼠群分离的每一天都会损失1点智力。它的智力不能低于4，如果它重新加入虫群或另一个虫群，它的智力会再次变成15。

entries.name: Telepathic Vermin
entries: 一只低智商的颅鼠利用其自然的心灵感应来交流饥饿、恐惧和其他基本情绪。一群用心灵感应交流的颅鼠作为一个生物 "说话"，经常用集体代词 "我们 "和 "我们 "来称呼自己。

entries.name: Spies for an Elder Brain
entries: 噬心者殖民地使用颅骨老鼠作为间谍。这些老鼠入侵地表社区，充当长老会的眼睛和耳朵，当它们成群结队并在长老会心灵感应的范围内时，会传递它们的想法。
颅骨老鼠偶尔会扩散到长老大脑的影响范围之外。无论这些老鼠做什么，都与长老会无关，而且如果他们愿意的话，illithids总是可以制造更多。
古老的传说中，有一个背叛了夏日女王的塞利族人。他的真名已经从历史中抹去，但故事中称他为Dubh Catha（"黑暗乌鸦 "的俗称）。夏日女王的愤怒是如此之大，以至于她诅咒了他家的每一个成员。其他费伊人将杜伯-卡塔家族的后裔称为杜伯-西特--或者用普通话说，"黑灵"。黑暗人最常定居在其他物种的城镇下的隐蔽洞穴和房间里。在这样的飞地里，他们悄悄地做着小偷和刺客的生意。

entries.name: The Killing Light
entries: The Summer Queen's curse causes a darkling's body to absorb light, and doing so wizens the creature, much like the effect of rapid aging. For this reason, darklings cover every part of their body with clothing when exposure to light is a risk. The light a darkling absorbs over the course of its lifetime explodes outward when the darkling dies, incinerating the creature and much of its possessions.

entries.name: Love of Art
entries: Despite their curse, darklings retain a fondness for the beauty of art. A darkling might risk taking a peek at a sunset or lighting a tiny candle to glimpse the colors in a painting or a jewel.

entries.name: Elder Transformation
entries: A wise and respected darkling can qualify to undergo a ritual to become an elder. Other elders mark the supplicant with glowing tattoos, channeling some of the darkling's absorbed light away from its body. If the ritual succeeds, the darkling grows into a tall and fair form, like that of a gray-skinned elf. The darkling perishes if the ritual fails.
古老的传说中，有一个背叛了夏日女王的塞利族人。他的真名已经从历史中抹去，但故事中称他为Dubh Catha（"黑暗乌鸦 "的俗称）。夏日女王的愤怒是如此之大，以至于她诅咒了他家的每一个成员。其他费伊人将杜伯-卡塔家族的后裔称为杜伯-西特--或者用普通话说，"黑灵"。黑暗人最常定居在其他物种的城镇下的隐蔽洞穴和房间里。在这样的飞地里，他们悄悄地做着小偷和刺客的生意。

entries.name: The Killing Light
entries: The Summer Queen's curse causes a darkling's body to absorb light, and doing so wizens the creature, much like the effect of rapid aging. For this reason, darklings cover every part of their body with clothing when exposure to light is a risk. The light a darkling absorbs over the course of its lifetime explodes outward when the darkling dies, incinerating the creature and much of its possessions.

entries.name: Love of Art
entries: Despite their curse, darklings retain a fondness for the beauty of art. A darkling might risk taking a peek at a sunset or lighting a tiny candle to glimpse the colors in a painting or a jewel.

Other elders mark the supplicant with glowing tattoos, channeling some of the darkling's absorbed light away from its body. If the ritual succeeds, the darkling grows into a tall and fair form, like that of a gray-skinned elf. The darkling perishes if the ritual fails.
死亡之吻是一种较小的待人接物，当待人接物者做了一个关于失血的生动的噩梦时可能会出现。它没有神奇的眼线，而是有十条长长的触角，每条触角的末端都有一张长满牙齿的嘴。在颜色和形状上，它与梦到它存在的观世音相似，但它的色调更加柔和。

entries.name: Blood Drinker
entries: A death kiss survives solely on ingested blood, which it uses to generate electrical energy inside its body. Paranoid about dying from starvation, it obsessively drains even little creatures such as rats in an effort to stave off this fate for as long as possible. After it drains its prey, it abandons the corpse to scavengers. A death kiss prefers to hunt alone. If it meets another death kiss, it might fight, flee, or team up, depending on its health and pride. When underground, it uses its tentacles as feelers, prodding and examining the environment in all directions. Above ground, it usually keeps its tentacles retracted when on the hunt, then lashes out and extends them to their full length to catch opponents off guard.

entries.name: False Tyrant
entries: In poor lighting and with its tentacles extended, a death kiss can be mistaken for a true beholder. It might purposely present itself as a beholder to an ignorant creature, but this behavior is rare, since it usually is focused on hunting and lacks the self-importance and paranoia of a true beholder. It can speak through any of its tentacle-throats, and its voice sounds nasal and high-pitched. A true beholder has little to fear from a death kiss, since it can easily kill or subdue the death kiss long before the death kiss gets into melee range. Thus, out of self-preservation, a death kiss usually submits to the rule of a beholder that it encounters, though it might attempt to escape as soon as its master is preoccupied.

entries.name: Simple Tactics
entries: A death kiss lacks the combat finesse and intelligence of a beholder. It might attempt an unusual maneuver to control its prey (such as flying up while grappling), but in most cases, it attaches one or more of its tentacles to a creature and drains blood until its prey collapses. If it is in a superior position and its opponent poses no threat, it might toy with its food, slowly squeezing and draining the life out of a creature.
深海后裔的生活开始于那些从岸上被盗或从沉船中被救的人，他们被一种海底力量提供了一个可怕的交易：投降，身体和灵魂，或者淹死。那些投降的人要接受一种在邪恶的水生生物中广泛存在的古老仪式。其方法是痛苦的，结果也不确定，但当它起作用时，这个魔法将一个呼吸空气的人变成一个变形人，可以采取完全在海下的形式。

entries.name: Spies from the Sea
entries: A deep scion emerges from the depths in service to its underwater master, which is likely a kraken or some other ancient being of the deep. While wearing the mind and body of the person it once was as a sort of mask, the creature is bent on fulfilling its master's desires. Sometimes a deep scion returns to its former home and a hero's welcome-unexpectedly found alive when all hope was lost. At other times the deep scion takes on a new identity. In any case, it is the deep scion's duty to infiltrate the air-breathing world and report back to its master. When set to its task, a deep scion worms its way into the life of an unsuspecting enemy as a new best friend, an irresistible lover, the perfect candidate for a job, or in some other role that enables the minion to carry out its master's commands.
如果你遇到一个人类，而他们身上有一些腥味，他们可能是一个深藏不露的子孙。或者是一个骗子，或者只是一个鱼贩子。有时鱼腥味就是鱼腥味。
-Volo

entries.name: Cold-Hearted Killers
entries: The training to which a deep scion is subjected rids it of empathy for those whom it spies on. Though one might behave as though infatuated, laugh at the joke of a friend, or appear incensed at some injustice, each of these acts is artificial to the deep scion, a means to an end. It believes that its true form is the shape it takes when it returns to the sea that it thinks of as home. Ironically, however, a deep scion that is killed when in its piscine form is stripped of the magic that robbed it of emotion, leaving behind the corpse of the person the deep scion once was.
迅猛龙的这个较大的表亲通过用爪子抓住目标并在生物还活着的时候进食来进行杀戮。
在奥库斯释放的所有憎恶中，吞噬者是最令人恐惧的。这些高大的、像木乃伊一样的恶魔在各个星球上游荡，吞噬灵魂，并以身作则，传播奥库斯的信条，用永恒的死亡取代所有生命。

entries.name: Instruments of Orcus
entries: A lesser demon that proves itself to Orcus might be granted the privilege of becoming a devourer. The Prince of Undeath transforms such a demon into an 8-foot-tall, desiccated humanoid with a hollowed-out ribcage, then fills the new creature with a hunger for souls. Orcus grants each new devourer the essence of a less fortunate demon to power the devourer's first foray into the planes. Most devourers remain in the Abyss, or on the Astral or Ethereal Plane, pursuing Orcus's schemes and interests in those realms. When Orcus sends devourers to the Material Plane, he often sets them on a mission to create, control, and lead a plague of undead. Skeletons, zombies, ghouls and ghasts, and shadows are particularly attracted to the presence of a devourer.
我听说过 "插肋"，但这太荒谬了。
-Volo

entries.name: Tormentors of Souls
entries: Devourers hunt humanoids, with the intent of consuming them body and soul. After a devourer brings a target to the brink of death, it pulls the victim's body in and traps the creature within its own ribcage. As the victim tries to stave off death (usually without success), the devourer tortures its soul with telepathic noise. When the victim expires, it undergoes a horrible transformation, springing forth from the devourer's body to begin its new existence as an undead servitor of the monster that spawned it.

entries.name: Fiendish Nature
entries: A devourer doesn't require air, food (other than souls), drink, or sleep.
这种帆背爬行动物通常在恐龙生活的地区被发现。它在岸边和浅水区捕食，扮演着与鳄鱼类似的角色。
占卜师是专业的巫师，他们知道知识就是力量。他们可能表现得冷漠而神秘，暗示预兆和秘密，也可能是万事通，泄露秘密和洞察力以提高自己的地位或声誉。
海豚是聪明的、社会性的海洋哺乳动物，以小鱼和鱿鱼为食。一个成年标本的长度在5到6英尺之间。
draegloth是一个半乌鸦、半格拉布瑞兹的恶魔，由一个乌鸦大祭司在一个不神圣的、危险的仪式中诞生。它拥有与生俱来的魔法和身体的力量，通常为其母亲的家族服务，将其对破坏的渴望借给该家族的计划，以战胜其对手。
德雷格拉斯是一种食人魔大小的四臂人形生物，拥有紫黑色的皮肤和黄白色的头发。它的两只手臂巨大且肌肉发达，顶端有锋利的爪子；另外两只手臂的大小和形状与乌鸦的手臂一样，能够进行精细的运动。虽然这个生物肌肉发达，但它却像一个乌鸦一样优雅而安静。它的脸明显是恶魔化的，有兽性的特征，发光的红眼睛，拉长的狗一样的鼻子，和满嘴的尖牙。

entries.name: Blessing on the House
entries: The ritual to create a draegloth succeeds only rarely, but when it does, it is a great event that is seen by the drow of the house as a sign of the demon lord Lolth's favor-and a sign of Lolth's disregard for the family's rivals, which were not thus gifted. The birth prompts the leaders of the house to begin crafting new plans to strike at its rivals when the draegloth is fully grown. These plans always use the draegloth in a significant role, because its abilities can turn the tide in a battle against a house that doesn't have a draegloth of its own.
这些乌鸦家的宠物就像沃特达威的舞台舞者一样优雅和灵活。只是他们是屠夫和执法者，四肢发达，像食人魔一样。生活是不公平的。
-Volo

entries.name: Subservient Enforcers
entries: Although it plays an important part in the welfare of its house, a draegloth can't rise above the status of a favored slave or a consort to a priestess. Before a draegloth is given any duties, it receives instruction in accepting the role set for it and not challenging authority. Draegloths instinctively resist this sort of treatment, but most of them take out their frustration on their house's enemies. A draegloth that can't suppress its ambitions might abandon its house and strike out on its own. Whether these rebellious draegloths are part of Lolth's plan for sowing even greater chaos is unclear.

entries.name: Brute Cunning and Dark Magic
entries: A draegloth loves the feeling of tearing opponents apart with its claws and teeth and of wielding the magic that courses through its veins. Most are too impatient to bother with complicated tactics, but a few go on to learn more destructive magic.
长老的大脑是伊里希德统治的终极表现，它在一桶粘稠的盐水中蔓延，触及远近生物的思想。它在他们思想的画布上涂鸦，改写他们的思想，编写他们的梦想。

entries.name: Psychic Infiltrators
entries: When an elder brain infiltrates a mind, it alters the creature's perception and deceives its senses, causing it to see, hear, touch, taste, or feel reality according to the elder brain's intent. From across great distances, it implants subconscious suggestions or subtly influences dreams to compel creatures toward a course of action that benefits its grand plan.
当它阴险的建议未能奏效时，长老的大脑就会更直接地宣示其统治地位。它夺取了反抗者的思想控制权，并像控制木偶一样控制该生物的身体。对于极少数反抗它或攻击它的意志坚强的顽固分子，长者之脑会发出一股压倒性的精神力量来粉碎新来者的思想，使其成为一个没有思想、流口水的躯壳。
当一个掠夺者死亡时，长老大脑的仆人会将其头骨中的内容喂给他们的主人，而主人则会吸收这个幻兽的大脑以及其中包含的所有知识和经验。通过这种方式，长老脑不断地增加它的知识，将illithid群体的思想和经验整合成一个统一的整体。传心者认为这种 "一体 "是一种神圣的状态，就像人类神灵的崇拜者看待天堂里的永恒来世一样，因为长老脑可以唤起它曾经吸收过的任何幻象的角色。
长者大脑的野心总是被其相对的不动性所抑制。虽然它的心灵感应可以达到数英里，但移动任何地方都是一个危险的提议。如果被迫离开它的盐水池，长者之脑就会迅速死亡，而将长者之脑运出它的盐水池，通过狭小而曲折的地下隧道，常常被证明是困难或不可能的。

entries.name: Devourer of Thoughts
entries: An elder brain sustains itself by consuming the brains of other creatures. When the mind flayer servants that guard and tend to an elder brain don't bring its meals directly to it, the elder brain reaches out with tendrils of thought, mentally compelling creatures to come to it so that it may feed upon them.

entries.name: Hive Mind
entries: Non-illithids call this creature an elder brain because it acts as the central communication hub for an entire mind flayer colony just as a brain does for a living body. Linked to the elder brain, the colony acts like a single organism, acting in concert as if each illithid were the digit of a hand.

entries.name: Ego Unhindered
entries: Each elder brain considers itself and its desires the most important things in the multiverse, the mind flayers in its colony nothing more than extensions of its will. But no two elder brains are alike, and each presides over its colony according to its own unique personality and storehouse of collected knowledge and experience. Some elder brains reign as domineering tyrants, while others serve more benignly as sages, counselors, and repositories of information and lore for the mind flayers that protect and nourish them.

entries.name: An Elder Brain's Lair
entries: 长老脑的巢穴总是位于噬心者聚居地的深处。这种生物居住在一个发着微弱光芒的盐水池中，里面充满了被长老会的生命液和幻觉能量注入的污秽和咸水。
魔法师是专业的巫师，他们了解如何用魔法改变和控制思想。他们可能很有个性，也很有趣，只有在戏谑和传统的劝说失败时才会使用魔法来操纵人们，或者他们可能很粗鲁，要求很高，使用和依赖（%0%），听话的奴才。
唤醒者是专业的巫师，他们利用魔法能量和元素力量进行破坏。许多人倾向于头脑发热，具有攻击性。其他人则冷酷而矜持，在适当的时候释放他们的力量以利用对手的弱点。
火巨人的条例不仅强调力量，还强调锻造技术。铸造厂是任何火巨人社区的核心。它是寺庙、学校、试验场和政治中心，融为一体。
那些有膂力但没有头脑的人通常会被分配到最低级的任务中，比如从事锻造风箱或搬运煤炭。然而，有一个角色是他们中最强壮的人可以胜任并获得等级：无畏舰。

entries.name: Weapons of War
entries: Dreadnoughts are massively powerful fire giants who wield two huge shields like plow blades. These shields bear spikes on their exterior and have hollow interiors into which the dreadnought pours hot coals at the first sign of danger. Armed with its two shields, the dreadnought can present a fiery wall to any attacker. When the dreadnought has finished, often all that is left of a foe is a smoking smear on the floor.
在不需要战斗的时候，无畏舰通过使用它们的盾牌在铸造厂内推送大量的煤、石头或矿石来保持它们的力量。偶尔，无畏舰会被他们的上级召唤去陪同一个战争或外交代表团，无畏舰的存在在这两种情况下都会呈现出凶猛的一面。
在含有温泉、火山活动或类似湿热条件的地区，可能会发现火牛。这些人形两栖动物生活在军国主义的神权中，崇尚火元素的最坏化身。

entries.name: Heat Seekers
entries: Firenewts need hot water to live and breed. A firenewt becomes sluggish, mentally and physically, after spending a week away from an external source of moist heat. A prolonged lack of heat can shut down a firenewt community, as the creatures within go into hibernation and their eggs stop developing.
Firenewts在地球上寻找热源，如沸腾的泥浆和温泉，这些地方是理想的定居地。通过在该地区的挖掘和开采，它们形成了生活空间，并获得了充足的矿物供应，用于其他用途，如熔炼、铁匠和炼金术。一个火牛巢穴的特点是有一个渠道和水闸网络，以使热液在定居点内循环。
Firenewts所练习的炼金术以火为重点。他们最喜欢的混合物之一是硫磺、矿物盐和油的混合物。火牛习惯性地咀嚼这种混合物，因为这样做会产生一种令人愉快的内部热量，并使火牛能够吐出一个小火球。大多数火纽特携带一个装有这种混合物的容器。
Imix的术士们指挥战士们通过突袭带回财宝和俘虏来证明自己的价值。术士们把最精挑细选的战利品作为对伊米克斯的奉献，然后那些参与突袭的人根据功绩分配其余的东西。没有明显用处的俘虏被献给伊米克斯，然后被吃掉。那些被认为有能力在巢穴周围采矿和做其他杂务的人，在遭遇同样的命运之前，会被作为奴隶保存一段时间。
当火羚羊为战争而集结时，而不仅仅是偶尔的突袭，它们不留活口。它们的目标是消灭它们的敌人--它们对其他同类保留最大的敌意。如果两群火蚁相遇，它们很可能是为了争夺同一块领土，而一场血腥的战斗是通常的结果。

entries.name: Religious Militants
entries: Firenewt society and culture are based on the worship of Imix, the Prince of Evil Fire. This veneration of Imix leads firenewts to be aggressive, wrathful, and cruel. Firenewt warlocks of Imix teach that by demonstrating these qualities, a firenewt warrior in combat can become "touched by the Fire Lord," entering a nearly unstoppable battle rage.

entries.name: Giant Striders
entries: Firenewts have a close relationship with a type of monstrous beast they believe Imix sent to aid them-borne out by the creatures' ability to send a gout of flame against distant enemies. Called giant striders, these monsters appear birdlike and reptilian, but are truly neither. Firenewts provide shelter, food, and breeding grounds in their lairs for giant striders, and the striders voluntarily serve as mounts for elite fire newt soldiers.

蜗牛是一种土元素的生物，因其多色的外壳而受到珍视。猎人在看到这种笨重的、似乎没有敌意的生物时，可能会陷入一种虚假的自信之中。不过，如果任何其他足以构成威胁的生物靠得太近，这只蜗牛就会释放出闪烁的光芒，然后用它的马具般的触手进行攻击。

entries.name: Trail of Treasure
entries: Left undisturbed, a flail snail moves slowly along the ground, consuming everything on the surface, including rocks, sand, and soil, stopping to relish crystal growths and other large mineral deposits. It leaves behind a shimmering trail that quickly solidifies into a thin layer of a nearly transparent substance inedible to the snail. This glassy residue can be harvested and cut to form window panes of varying clearness. It can also be heated and spun into glass objects of other sorts. Some humanoids make a living from trailing flail snails to collect this glass.

entries.name: Using the Shell of a Flail Snail
entries: 一个耀眼的蜗牛壳，大约有250磅重，有许多用途。一个完整的壳可以卖到5,000金币。
许多猎人因为它的抗魔特性而寻找这种外壳。一个熟练的装甲师可以用一个壳制作三个盾牌。在1个月内，每个盾牌都会给持盾者带来蜗牛的抗魔壳特性。当盾牌的魔力消失时，它留下了一个异国情调的盾牌，是制作（%0%）的完美物品。
扇形蜗牛壳也可以用来制作（%0%）。在制作服装时，将贝壳磨碎并添加到染料中。这种粉末也是给长袍施法的仪式的物质成分。
弗林德是一种特别强壮和凶恶的地精，它指挥和引导它所属的战队。它挥舞着一把由耶诺古自己灌注了强大魔法的信号棒。
一个战队只能有一个弗林，这个生物设定了一个战队的道路。由于它与耶诺古的特殊联系，风神利用神赐予的预兆和恶魔的洞察力，引导地精走向成熟的弱小猎物，以供屠杀。
不像其他的人形领袖可能会躲在他们的部下身后，弗林德会在战斗中带头冲锋。它的长矛会给被它击中的人带来剧烈的疼痛、麻痹和迷失方向。
蛙人是一种像大象一样大的两栖食肉动物。它栖息在沼泽地里，有四条触角，厚厚的橡胶皮，一个充满獠牙的大嘴和一个无柄的舌头，以及一个可延伸的柄，上面有三只面向不同方向的球状眼睛。

entries.name: Otherworldly Entities
entries: Froghemoths are creatures not of this world. A journal purportedly written long ago by the wizard Lum the Mad describes strange, cylindrical chambers of metal buried in the ground from which froghemoths emerged, but no reliable reports of the location of such places exist.

entries.name: Hungry from Birth
entries: Every few years, a froghemoth can lay a fertile egg without mating. The froghemoth cares nothing for its egg, and might eat the hatchling. A young froghemoth's survival is most often predicated on its parent leaving it behind in indifference. A newborn froghemoth grows to full size over a period of months by indiscriminately preying on other creatures in its swampy domain. It learns to hide its enormous body in murky pools, keeping only its eyestalk above water to watch for passing creatures. When food comes within reach, the froghemoth erupts from its pool, tentacles and tongue flailing. It can grab several targets at once, keeping them at bay while it wraps its tongue around another one and pulls it in to be devoured.

entries.name: Revered by Bullywugs
entries: If a bullywug tribe comes across a froghemoth, the bullywugs treat the froghemoth as a god and do all they can to coax the monster into their den. A froghemoth can be tamed (after a fashion) by offering it food, and bullywugs can communicate with it on a basic level, so the creature might eat only a few bullywugs before following the rest. Bullywugs gather food as tribute for it, provide it with a comfortable lair, fanatically protect it from harm, and try to ensure that any young froghemoth reaches maturity.
为了保持自己的地位或在军团中崛起，冰霜巨人必须经常在单兵作战中面对强大的敌人。有些人寻找可以帮助他们的魔法，但被施了魔法的东西可能会被拿走或丢失。真正的伟大要靠个人的能力。面对这一事实，冰霜巨人可能会从毁灭者瓦普拉克那里寻求一份超自然的礼物。

entries.name: Troll Eater
entries: Frost giants mainly turn to Vaprak, a rapacious god of strength and hunger worshiped by ogres and trolls, out of desperation. Vaprak likes to tempt frost giants with dreams of glory followed by nightmares of bloody cannibalism. Those who don't shrink from such visions or report them to priests of Thrym receive more of the same. If a frost giant comes to relish these dreams and nightmares, as some do, Vaprak sets a troll upon a sacred quest to find the frost giant and meet it in secret. The troll offers up its own body to be devoured in Vaprak's name. Only the boldest and most determined frost giants can finish such a gory feast.

entries.name: Vaprak's Blessing
entries: After devouring the troll sent by Vaprak, bones and all, a frost giant becomes an everlasting one, gaining tremendous strength, an ill temper, and a troll's regenerative ability. With these gifts, the frost giant can swiftly claim the title of jarl and easily fend off rivals for decades. However, if the frost giant doesn't give enough honor to Vaprak or fails to heed Vaprak's visions, injuries the frost giant sustains heal wrong, often resulting in discolored skin, warty scars, and vestigial body parts, such as extra digits, limbs, and even extra heads. The touch of Vaprak can no longer be hidden then, and the everlasting one is either killed or exiled by its clan. Sometimes small communities of everlasting ones gather and even reproduce, passing the "blessing" and worship of Vaprak from one generation to the next.
高斯是一种饥饿的、暴虐的、类似于beholder的生物，它吃魔法，并试图从任何比自己弱的东西身上索取贡品。它的身体直径约为4英尺，有六根眼梗，一只中央的眼睛（有时被多只小眼睛包围），嘴边有四只小的抓取触手。它的颜色和纹理变化类似于真正的beholder。

entries.name: Magical Metabolism
entries: A gauth can survive on meat but prefers to sustain itself with power drained from magic objects. If starved of magic for several weeks, it is forced back to its home plane, so it constantly seeks new items to drain. A gauth might employ creatures to serve it by bringing it items that provide it with sustenance.

entries.name: Accidental Summoning
entries: When the ritual to summon a spectator goes wrong, a gauth might push itself through the flawed connection, arriving immediately or several minutes later. It might present itself as a beholder to ignorant creatures in an attempt to intimidate them, or as a spectator to its summoner in order to drain magic items it is expected to guard.

entries.name: Inferior Tyrant
entries: A beholder usually drives away or kills any gauths that enter its territory, but it might choose to enslave them and use them as lieutenants. Gauths are less xenophobic than beholders, so they might form small clusters and work together, though they're just as likely to ignore each other entirely.
凝视者是观察者的梦想的微小表现。它与梦到它的人很相似，但它的身体只有8英寸宽，而且只有四根眼梗。它像一只忠实的、好斗的小狗一样跟随它的创造者，有时这些生物的小群会在它们主人的巢穴里巡逻，寻找可以杀死的害虫和可以骚扰的孤独生物。

entries.name: Nuisance Pet
entries: A gazer can't speak any languages but can approximate mimicking words and sentences in a high-pitched, mocking manner. Beholders find gazers amusing and tolerate their presence like spoiled pets. A gazer can't be tamed by anyone but its creator, except through the use of magic or by bonding with a spellcaster (see sidebar). Some beholders with wizard minions insist they take a gazer as a familiar because they can see through the eyes of these creatures.

entries.name: Aggressive Vermin-Eater
entries: A wild gazer (one living separately from a beholder) is territorial, eats bugs and small animals, and is known for playing with its food. A lone gazer avoids picking fights with creatures that are Medium or larger, but a pack of them might take on larger prey. A gazer might follow humanoids in its territory, noisily mimicking their speech and generally being a nuisance, until they leave the area, but it flees if confronted by something it can't kill.

entries.name: Variant: Gazer Familiar
entries: 对不寻常的家族动物感兴趣的施法者发现，凝视者渴望为拥有魔法力量的人服务，尤其是那些以欺负和骚扰他人为目的的人。凝视者对比自己小的生物表现得很有攻击性，它往往会随意攻击家里的宠物、农场动物，甚至是镇上的孩子，除非它的主人非常严格。作为熟人的凝视者具有以下特征。

entries.name: Familiar
entries: The gazer can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a telepathic bond with its willing master, provided that the master is at least a 3rd-level spellcaster. While the two are bonded, the master can sense what the gazer senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. If its master causes it physical harm, the gazer will end its service as a familiar, breaking the telepathic bond.
在含有温泉、火山活动或类似湿热条件的地区，可能会发现火牛。这些人形两栖动物生活在军国主义的神权中，崇尚火元素的最坏化身。

entries.name: Heat Seekers
entries: Firenewts need hot water to live and breed. A firenewt becomes sluggish, mentally and physically, after spending a week away from an external source of moist heat. A prolonged lack of heat can shut down a firenewt community, as the creatures within go into hibernation and their eggs stop developing.
Firenewts在地球上寻找热源，如沸腾的泥浆和温泉，这些地方是理想的定居地。通过在该地区的挖掘和开采，它们形成了生活空间，并获得了充足的矿物供应，用于其他用途，如熔炼、铁匠和炼金术。一个火牛巢穴的特点是有一个渠道和水闸网络，以使热液在定居点内循环。
Firenewts所练习的炼金术以火为重点。他们最喜欢的混合物之一是硫磺、矿物盐和油的混合物。火牛习惯性地咀嚼这种混合物，因为这样做会产生一种令人愉快的内部热量，并使火牛能够吐出一个小火球。大多数火纽特携带一个装有这种混合物的容器。
Imix的术士们指挥战士们通过突袭带回财宝和俘虏来证明自己的价值。术士们把最精挑细选的战利品作为对伊米克斯的奉献，然后那些参与突袭的人根据功绩分配其余的东西。没有明显用处的俘虏被献给伊米克斯，然后被吃掉。那些被认为有能力在巢穴周围采矿和做其他杂务的人，在遭遇同样的命运之前，会被作为奴隶保存一段时间。
当火羚羊为战争而集结时，而不仅仅是偶尔的突袭，它们不留活口。它们的目标是消灭它们的敌人--它们对其他同类保留最大的敌意。如果两群火蚁相遇，它们很可能是为了争夺同一块领土，而一场血腥的战斗是通常的结果。

entries.name: Religious Militants
entries: Firenewt society and culture are based on the worship of Imix, the Prince of Evil Fire. This veneration of Imix leads firenewts to be aggressive, wrathful, and cruel. Firenewt warlocks of Imix teach that by demonstrating these qualities, a firenewt warrior in combat can become "touched by the Fire Lord," entering a nearly unstoppable battle rage.

entries.name: Giant Striders
entries: Firenewts have a close relationship with a type of monstrous beast they believe Imix sent to aid them-borne out by the creatures' ability to send a gout of flame against distant enemies. Called giant striders, these monsters appear birdlike and reptilian, but are truly neither. Firenewts provide shelter, food, and breeding grounds in their lairs for giant striders, and the striders voluntarily serve as mounts for elite fire newt soldiers.
吉拉龙看起来像一个超大的四臂猿，有灰色的皮肤和白色的毛发。它的獠牙和爪子使它有别于普通的猿猴，显示出它是一种可怕的捕食者。

entries.name: Forest Hunters
entries: Girallons are most common in temperate or warm forest environments abundant with life. They share the ape's adeptness at climbing, although these half-ton creatures shy away from scaling trees that can't support their bulk. Instead, they stalk the forest floor, lurk in narrow ravines or shallow caves, or hide in ruined sites while waiting for prey to come near. A girallon is surprisingly stealthy, considering its size and its lack of camouflage.
长颈鹿由几个个体和它们的后代组成松散的群体，通常由一个占主导地位的成年人领导，他也往往是群体中最老的成员。当在远离巢穴的地方狩猎时，长颈鹿使用吼叫和肢体语言进行远距离交流。每个个体通常单独狩猎，并与其他个体分开，以确保每个人都得到足够的饲料。领导者可能会组织成员一起合作，进行一次大屠杀。如果他们成功了，群体中的每个人都会分享战利品，最好的部分会给照顾孩子的母亲。
在此后的时间里，许多生物都试图驯服、征服或与怪物合作。例如，元帝奴役长颈鹿，把它们变成他们蛇国的边境哨兵。由于长颈鹿在它们的同类中是和平的，一些人类已经学会了如何接近一个群体的首领，提供食物和其他礼物，希望能与这些生物建立联盟。
受到良好对待的吉拉龙可能愿意担任警卫，尽管它们缺乏智慧，无法承担比攻击进入它们领域的陌生人更复杂的任务。如果一只长颈鹿年幼并经过适当的训练，它可能会出现在一个看似不可能的地方，例如守卫城市的盗贼公会的入口。那些将吉拉龙作为宠物饲养的人必须始终保持警惕，因为这种生物随时都可能恢复其掠夺性。

entries.name: Wall Climbers
entries: The ruins of humanoid habitations, especially those found in deep forests and jungles, seem to attract girallons. They move effortlessly along stairs and balconies, as well as on the sloped rooftops and buttresses of such formations. To a girallon, a city's buildings are just another sort of forest-and better yet, one whose uppermost "branches" can easily support the creatures. In such a setting, the girallons take full advantage of their skill in climbing. The creatures can easily scale walls and battlements, and they perch on tower tops and other high vantages to keep an eye on the surrounding area.

entries.name: Magical Origin
entries: The social habits of wild girallons are unusual for apes, as is their instinctive attraction to humanoid structures. These facts, together with the girallon's appearance, lead sages to believe that girallons were created through magic to serve as guardians for some lost empire. When that empire fell ages ago, girallons turned feral and spread out across the world.
如果说有哪一群地精可以说是比其他的地精更野性的话，那么这个区别将归于啃肉者。这些地精放弃了使用远程武器，而选择了他们以速度和效率挥舞的短刀。在激烈的战斗中，他们能够冲过战场，一边砍杀一边咆哮，击倒散兵游勇，解决掉受伤的敌人。
猎人是战队中最隐蔽的地精，他们在战场上以多种方式发挥着自己的才能。在战队的前锋中，猎手悄悄地走来走去，干掉孤立的对手，同时为其他部队在敌人的领土上横冲直撞开辟道路。
猎人特别擅长使用长弓，他们射出的箭头上有恶毒的倒刺。即使猎人没有在第一时间杀死目标，箭的打击也会带来巨大的痛苦，以至于受害者在试图逃跑时步履蹒跚。当一个正在徘徊的猎人发现猎物，并且不关心如何保持隐蔽性时，它会吹响一个用骨头制作的号角，发出类似于女妖叫声的尖锐哀号。
有时，地精会互相反目，也许是为了决定谁统治一个战团，或者是因为极度饥饿。即使在普通情况下，被剥夺了受害者太久的地精也无法控制他们的饥饿和暴力冲动。最终，它们会相互厮杀。
幸存者吞噬了他们被杀的战友的肉，但保留了骨头。然后，通过对耶诺古的祈祷仪式，他们以地精枯萎的形式使遗体恢复了生命的模样。
威瑟林的行为和地精在生活中的行为一样，与他们的同伴一起旅行，并试图杀死他们路上的任何东西。他们不吃东西，也不为饥饿所驱使，为战队的其他成员留下更多的肉体。地精小精灵无法挥舞任何比简单的棍棒更复杂的武器。

entries.name: Undead Nature
entries: A gnoll witherling doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
我听说有一个术士试图用魔法把一个被摧毁的地精战队的最后的凋零者变成他自己的打击敌人的力量。这招很管用，直到耶诺古派了七个战队来对付他。
-Volo
蛙人是在雨林和热带丛林中发现的具有攻击性的青蛙类人。它们有强烈的领地意识，认为自己比其他大多数生物更优越。

entries.name: Tree-Dwelling Amphibians
entries: Grungs live in trees and prefer shade. A grung hatchery is maintained in well-guarded ground-level pools. About three months after hatching, a grung tadpole takes on the shape of an adult. It takes another six to nine months for a grung juvenile to reach maturity.
绿肺是部落的战士、猎人和劳动者，蓝肺则是工匠和其他家庭角色。监督和指导这两个群体的是紫色的格格，它们充当管理者和指挥官。(使用grung状态块来代表绿色、蓝色和紫色种姓的成员）。
红袍人是该部落的学者和魔法使用者。他们比紫色、蓝色和绿色的格陵人更优越，甚至被地位更高的格陵人给予适当的尊重。(使用grung wildling状态块来代表红色种姓的成员）。
高等种姓包括橙色种姓和金色种姓，前者是精英战士，对所有低等种姓拥有权威，后者则担任最高领导职务。一个部落的君主总是一个金色的grung。(使用grung精英战士状态块来代表橙色和金色种姓的成员。)
一个种姓的人通常会在其种姓中生活一辈子。在极少数情况下，一个以伟大事迹出众的人可以获得加入更高种姓的邀请。通过草药补剂和仪式魔法的结合，被提升的grung会改变颜色，并以与该种姓的青少年相同的方式加入新种姓。从那时起，grung和它的后代都是较高种姓的成员。
有知觉的、住在树上的毒蛙。真的，众神恨我们。
-Volo

entries.name: Castes and Colors
entries: Grung society is a caste system. Each caste lays eggs in a separate hatching pool, and juvenile grungs join their caste upon emergence from the hatchery. All grungs are a dull greenish gray when they are born, but each individual takes on the color of its caste as it grows to adulthood.

entries.name: Naturally Toxic
entries: All grungs secrete a substance that is harmless to them but poisonous to other creatures. A grung also uses venom to poison its weapons.

entries.name: Slavers
entries: Grungs are always on the lookout for creatures they can capture and enslave. Grungs use slaves for all manner of menial tasks, but mostly they just like bossing them around. Slaves are fed mildly {@condition poisoned} food to keep them lethargic and compliant. A creature afflicted in this way over a long period of time becomes a shell of its former self and can be restored to normalcy only by magic.

entries.name: Water Dependency
entries: A grung that fails to immerse itself in water for at least 1 hour during a day suffers one level of {@condition exhaustion} at the end of that day. A grung can recover from this {@condition exhaustion} only through magic or by immersing itself in water for at least 1 hour.

entries.name: Variant: Grung Poison
entries: 菌类的毒药在从菌类身上取出后1分钟就会失去效力。如果菌类死亡，也会发生类似的故障。
一个被格陵的生物（%0%）会受到一个额外的影响，这个影响根据格陵的肤色而不同。这个效果会一直持续到该生物不再被格罗姆人影响（%1%）。

entries.name: Green
entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature can't move except to climb or make standing jumps. If the creature is flying, it can't take any actions or reactions unless it lands.

entries.name: Blue
entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature must shout loudly or otherwise make a loud noise at the start and end of its turn.

entries.name: Purple
entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature feels a desperate need to soak itself in liquid or mud. It can't take actions or move except to do so or to reach a body of liquid or mud.

entries.name: Red
entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature must use its action to eat if food is within reach.

entries.name: Orange
entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature is {@condition frightened} of its allies.

entries.name: Gold
entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature is {@condition charmed} and can speak Grung.

entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature can't move except to climb or make standing jumps. If the creature is flying, it can't take any actions or reactions unless it lands.

entries.name: Blue
entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature must shout loudly or otherwise make a loud noise at the start and end of its turn.

entries.name: Purple
entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature feels a desperate need to soak itself in liquid or mud. It can't take actions or move except to do so or to reach a body of liquid or mud.

entries.name: Red
entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature must use its action to eat if food is within reach.

蛙人是在雨林和热带丛林中发现的具有攻击性的青蛙类人。它们有强烈的领地意识，认为自己比其他大多数生物更优越。

entries.name: Tree-Dwelling Amphibians
entries: Grungs live in trees and prefer shade. A grung hatchery is maintained in well-guarded ground-level pools. About three months after hatching, a grung tadpole takes on the shape of an adult. It takes another six to nine months for a grung juvenile to reach maturity.
绿肺是部落的战士、猎人和劳动者，蓝肺则是工匠和其他家庭角色。监督和指导这两个群体的是紫色的格格，它们充当管理者和指挥官。(使用grung状态块来代表绿色、蓝色和紫色种姓的成员）。
红袍人是该部落的学者和魔法使用者。他们比紫色、蓝色和绿色的格陵人更优越，甚至被地位更高的格陵人给予适当的尊重。(使用grung wildling状态块来代表红色种姓的成员）。
高等种姓包括橙色种姓和金色种姓，前者是精英战士，对所有低等种姓拥有权威，后者则担任最高领导职务。一个部落的君主总是一个金色的grung。(使用grung精英战士状态块来代表橙色和金色种姓的成员。)
一个种姓的人通常会在其种姓中生活一辈子。在极少数情况下，一个以伟大事迹出众的人可以获得加入更高种姓的邀请。通过草药补剂和仪式魔法的结合，被提升的grung会改变颜色，并以与该种姓的青少年相同的方式加入新种姓。从那时起，grung和它的后代都是较高种姓的成员。
有知觉的、住在树上的毒蛙。真的，众神恨我们。
-Volo

entries.name: Castes and Colors
entries: Grung society is a caste system. Each caste lays eggs in a separate hatching pool, and juvenile grungs join their caste upon emergence from the hatchery. All grungs are a dull greenish gray when they are born, but each individual takes on the color of its caste as it grows to adulthood.

entries.name: Naturally Toxic
entries: All grungs secrete a substance that is harmless to them but poisonous to other creatures. A grung also uses venom to poison its weapons.

entries.name: Slavers
entries: Grungs are always on the lookout for creatures they can capture and enslave. Grungs use slaves for all manner of menial tasks, but mostly they just like bossing them around. Slaves are fed mildly {@condition poisoned} food to keep them lethargic and compliant. A creature afflicted in this way over a long period of time becomes a shell of its former self and can be restored to normalcy only by magic.
