守护龙是一种爬行动物，由龙的鳞片通过一种怪异而可怕的仪式创造出来。如果训练得当，德雷克是顺从的、忠诚的和有领地的，这使得它成为一个优秀的看门兽，可以听从简单的命令。

entries.name: Gifts from Dragons
entries: The ritual to create a guard drake was originally devised by the cult of Tiamat, but has spread to other groups that are skilled in arcana and associated with dragons. The cooperation of a dragon is necessary for the ritual to succeed, and a dragon typically provides its help when it wants to reward its allies or worshipers with a valuable servant.
这个仪式需要几天的时间，需要10磅的新鲜龙鳞（由与该团体结盟的龙捐赠），大量的鲜肉，以及一个铁锅。当这个过程完成后，一个半身人大小的蛋会从大锅里出现，并在几小时内准备好孵化。
守护龙类似于它被创造出来的龙的类型，但是没有翅膀，蹲着，肌肉发达。守护龙不能繁殖，它的鳞片也不能用来制造其他守护龙。

entries.name: Eager to Learn
entries: A newly hatched guard drake imprints upon the first creature that feeds it (usually the one planning to train it), establishing an aggressive but trusting bond with that individual. A guard drake is fully grown within two to three weeks and can be trained in the same length of time. One is the equivalent of a guard dog in terms of what it can be trained to do.

entries.name: Variant: Chromatic Guard Drakes
entries: 每种类型的色龙的鳞片和血液都能创造出一种护卫龙，类似于该类型龙的无翼、发育不良版本，具有与该类型相关的独特能力。每种龙都有下面描述的特殊功能。

entries.name: Black Guard Drake
entries: A black guard drake is amphibious (it can breathe air or water), has a swimming speed of 30 feet, and has resistance to acid damage.

entries.name: Blue Guard Drake
entries: A blue guard drake has a burrowing speed of 20 feet and resistance to lightning damage.

entries.name: Green Guard Drake
entries: A green guard drake is amphibious (it can breathe air or water), has a swimming speed of 30 feet, and has resistance to poison damage.

entries.name: Red Guard Drake
entries: A red guard drake has climbing speed of 30 feet and resistance to fire damage.

entries.name: White Guard Drake
entries: A white guard drake has a burrowing speed of 20 feet, a climbing speed of 30 feet, and resistance to cold damage.
黑龙是一种半四足的食草动物，可通过其骨质的头嵴识别。如果在孵化过程中，它可以被训练成携带一个小型或中型的骑手。
在哥布林社会中，破坏学院会识别具有魔法天赋的哥布林，并让他们接受艰苦的训练，赋予他们代表主人召唤火球和其他破坏性魔法的能力。一个在战场上的妖精破坏者同时是它所有盟友的福音和它周围每个敌人的威胁。

entries.name: Into the Fray
entries: While other cultures treat their wizards as cloistered academics, hobgoblins expect their spellcasters to fight. Devastators learn the basics of weapon use, and they measure their deeds by the enemies defeated though their magic.
破坏者得到了其他成员的尊重，他们从许多方面得到了服从和敬畏。他们用一次魔法就能废掉整个阵型的能力使他们在战斗中获得的荣耀远远超过单个战士。
其他文化可能认为使用这种能力是获得荣耀的捷径，但对霍布林人来说，魔法的天赋就像强大的剑臂或战术的辉煌一样有价值和有用。它们都是来自玛格鲁比耶特的恩赐，必须加以培养并向敌人释放。
毁灭学院认为，对魔法采取学术性的方法是一种软弱和低效的表现。一个战士不需要知道冶金学来挥舞刀剑，那么为什么一个巫师要关心魔法的来源？破坏者喜欢通过寻找敌人的施法者并摧毁他们来证明他们在战斗中的优势。

entries.name: Only Results Matter
entries: Devastators study a simplified form of evocation magic. Their training lacks the theory and context that other folk study, making them skilled in battle but relatively illiterate on the finer points of how and why their magic works.
铁影团是作为秘密警察、侦察员和刺客的霍布林僧侣。在其他的妖精中，他们负责侦查背叛、反叛和出卖的行为。

entries.name: Trained in Secret
entries: Iron Shadows are recruited from across the hobgoblin ranks. Each member keeps her eyes open for potential recruits, those whose agility and stamina are matched only by an ironclad commitment to Maglubiyet's will.
入选者要经过一系列测试，旨在揭示任何潜在的背叛行为。失败者会被杀死，而通过者则会接受魔法和武术的秘密训练。这种灌输是一个缓慢而艰巨的过程；许多有志之士没有完成它，而在这期间，铁影会不欢迎任何新成员加入他们的行列。在新兵训练期间，它通过寻找和报告可疑的行为为铁影人服务。
他们的面具也标志着他们战斗技术的所谓起源。马格卢比耶特的祭司教导说，大帝从一个大恶魔那里偷来了阴影的秘密，使他的追随者能够隐藏自己的身份，在阴影之间行走，并制作幻象来迷惑和迷惑敌人。

entries.name: Masters of Shadow and Fist
entries: When a recruit's training is complete, she is ready to wield a deadly combination of unarmed fighting techniques and shadow magic to deceive and defeat her foes. She continues to spy on other hobgoblins, but is now also empowered to conduct assassinations and spy missions, both against enemies and among goblinoids. These missions are ordained by the clerics of Maglubiyet, who keep a careful eye on the goblinoid community to ensure that it functions according to Maglubiyet's will.

entries.name: Masked Devils
entries: Iron Shadows on a secret mission wear masks crafted to resemble devils, both to conceal their identities and to strike fear into their foes.
追求奥术魔法的心灵传播者被当作异类放逐，对他们来说，不可能与长者的大脑进行永恒的交流。通往巫术王国的道路提供了一种逃避死亡永恒的方法，但这条道路是漫长而孤独的。Alhoons是使用捷径的心灵传播者。

entries.name: Arcane Temptation
entries: Elder brains forbid mind flayers from pursuing magic power aside from psionics, but it isn't an interdiction they must often enforce. Illithids brook no masters but members of their own kind, so it isn't in their nature to bow to any god or otherworldly patron. However, wizardry remains a rare temptation.
在咒语书的书页中，illithid看到了一个获得权威的系统。通过撰写这本书的巫师的著作，illithid人看到了一个高度智慧的头脑的运作。大多数发现咒语书的幻术师的反应是憎恶或漠不关心，但对一些人来说，咒语书是通往新思维方式的大门。
有一段时间，对这种禁忌文本的研究可以瞒着其他illithids，甚至瞒着长者的大脑。对巫术的理解就像一个活物一样躲避着心灵。然而，最终，理解会到来，如果要活下来，一个掠夺心灵的奥术师必须接受自己是异类，并逃离殖民地。
面对这个可怕的现实，一群由九名心灵分裂者组成的团体用他们的奥秘魔法和幻术编织了一个新的真理。这九个人称自己为alhoon，此后，所有追随他们脚步的人都被称为同一个名字。
起初，alhoon很难与普通读心者区分开来。最明显的区别是，它没有弑心者永远存在的粘液涂层。没有这种保护，Alhoon的皮肤会变得干燥和开裂。它的眼睛可能会显得干瘪和凹陷。这两个线索都很容易被没有见过噬心者的人错过。然而，在很短的时间内，alhoon的肉体就会枯萎，其空洞的眼窝会像其他地衣一样闪耀着冰冷的针尖之光。
心灵诱捕术所赋予的不死之身只持续到所选择的活体受害者的生命。因此，带着200岁的精灵来献祭的alhoon期待着比献祭35岁的人更长久的存在。Alhoons可以通过与新的受害者重复这个仪式来延长他们的存在，有效地为自己重新设置时钟。
破坏思维陷阱的periapt会使被困在里面的人被遗忘，因此alhoons经常一起工作，对periapt和他们喜欢的仪式地点进行精心保护。有时，只有一个alhoon被委托保管思维陷阱的periapt，但这是一个危险的提议。任何持有心灵陷阱periapt的人都会在攻击、拯救和检查中对与之相关的alhoons产生优势，而这些alhoons反过来在攻击、拯救和检查中对持有者产生不利。
此外，periapt的持有者可以与被困在其中的任何牺牲的灵魂进行心灵感应，periapt中的alhoons可以与持有者进行心灵感应。携带periapt的生物不能阻止alhoons的交流，但可以让被困的灵魂安静下来。

entries.name: Existential Fear
entries: Arcanist deviants that taste freedom from the colony react in a variety of ways. Some prize their privacy, others seek to commune with similar minds, and still others seek to dominate a colony, elevating themselves to the position of leadership normally held by an elder brain. Regardless of the arcanist's personal inclinations, it faces the same stark fact: When it dies, it will not join the host of minds in the elder brain. Deviant minds are never accepted as part of the collective. For it, death means oblivion.

entries.name: Dreadful Deliverance
entries: Lichdom offers salvation and the prospect of being able to pursue knowledge indefinitely. Having feasted on the brains of people when alive, a mind flayer has no compunction about feeding souls to a phylactery. The only hindrance to a mind flayer becoming a lich is the means, which is a secret some mind flayer arcanists stop at nothing to discover. Yet lichdom requires an arcane spellcaster to be at the apex of power, something many mind flayers find is far from their grasps.

entries.name: A Psionic Secret
entries: Alhoons can cooperate in the creation of a periapt of mind trapping, a fist-sized container made of silver, emerald, and amethyst. The process requires at least three mind flayer arcanists and the sacrifice of an equal number of souls from living victims in a three-day-long ritual of spellcasting and psionic communion. Upon its completion, free-willed undeath is conferred on the mind flayers, turning them into alhoons.

entries.name: Precarious Immortality
entries: Unlike with true lichdom, the periapt of mind trapping doesn't restore the alhoons to undeath if they are destroyed. Instead, a destroyed alhoon's mind is transferred to the periapt where it remains in communion with any other trapped alhoon minds, as well as the souls of those sacrificed.

entries.name: Variant: Mind Flayer Lich (Illithilich)
entries: 通往真正的巫师之路只有最强大的弑心法师才能追求，因为它需要有制作法器和施放（%0%）法术的能力。弑心者使用弑心者的状态块（见《怪物手册》），但有以下变化。

items: 它能说深层语言和底层语言，并有120英尺范围内的心灵感应。
它拥有魔法抵抗和先天法术（幻术）的特性，以及触手、提取大脑和心灵爆炸的动作选项（都在下面描述）。只要弑心者将捕获的灵魂喂给它的法器，它就能保持其触手的肌肉力量和提取大脑的能力。
它的一套传奇行动（如下所述）与普通巫师的行动不同。

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The lich has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
随意：探测思想，浮空
各1天：主宰怪物、平面移动（仅限自身）。

entries.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries: The lich's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 20). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components.

entries.name: Tentacles
entries: 近战武器攻击。命中率+12，范围5英尺，一个生物。命中：21（（%0%））精神伤害。如果目标是大型或小型的，它将被{@condition grappled}(逃脱DC15)，并且必须在DC20智力救赎中成功，否则将被{@condition stunned}，直到这次抓捕结束。

entries.name: Extract Brain
entries: 近战武器攻击。命中率+12，射程5英尺，一个{@condition incapacitated}人形{@condition grappled}的巫师。命中：55({@damage 10d10})穿刺伤害。如果这个伤害使目标的命中率降至0，巫师会通过提取和吞噬其大脑来杀死目标。

entries.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: 巫师在60英尺的范围内神奇地释放出精神能量。该区域内的每个生物必须在DC18智力救赎中成功，否则会受到27（（%0%））的精神伤害，并在1分钟内被（%1%）。一个生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复这个蓄力动作，如果成功则结束对它的影响。

entries.name: Illithilich Legendary Actions
entries: 巫师获得以下传奇行动选项，这些选项取代了巫师的所有传奇行动。

entries.name: Tentacles
entries: The lich makes one attack with its tentacles.

entries.name: Extract Brain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The lich uses Extract Brain.

entries.name: Mind Blast (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The lich recharges its Mind Blast and uses it.

entries.name: Cast Spell (Costs 1–3 Actions)
entries: The lich uses a spell slot to cast a 1st-, 2nd-, or 3rd-level spell that it has prepared. Doing so costs 1 legendary action per level of the spell.
幻术师是专门的巫师，他们扭曲光、声音、影子，甚至是思想，以创造虚假和准真实的效果。他们可以很张扬，以壮观和明显的方式使用他们的力量，或者安静和微妙，用他们的魔法来掩盖真相。
麒麟是高贵的天体生物。在外层空间，为仁慈的神灵服务的麒麟在善与恶的永恒斗争中发挥着直接作用。在凡间，麒麟作为命运的预言者、神圣的守护者和邪恶力量的制衡者而被广为传颂。

entries.name: Good Personified
entries: Ki-rins are the embodiment of good, and simply beholding one can evoke fear or awe in an observer. A typical ki-rin looks like a muscular stag the size of an elephant, covered in golden scales lined in some places with golden fur. It has a dark gold mane and tail, coppery cloven hooves, and a spiral-shaped coppery horn just above and between its luminous violet eyes. In a breeze or when aloft, the creature's scales and hair can create the impression that the ki-rin is ablaze with a holy, golden fire.
除了颜色之外，麒麟的外观也各不相同，这取决于每个麒麟所尊崇的神灵以及它通常为该神灵服务的功能。有些是马形，看起来像巨大的独角兽，通常被用作守护者。另一些则具有龙的特征，并倾向于成为邪恶的攻击性敌人。一只角是最常见的，但凶猛的麒麟可能有两只角，或像大鹿一样有一套鹿角。
世界上的麒麟声称要看守一个领土，一个麒麟可能会保护一个包括几个国家的地区。在其他位面，为善神服务的麒麟会去他们被命令的地方，这可能包括到物质位面执行任务。世界上的麒麟弟子通常作为侦察员、信使或间谍为其神灵服务。
麒麟被吸引到对勇气、忠诚、无私和真理等神灵的崇拜，以及对正义社会的推进。例如，在Faerûn，Ki-rins主要聚集在Torm，尽管Ki-rins也为他的盟友Tyr和Ilmater服务。
许多寻求麒麟指导的人最终都承诺为该生物服务。他们在麒麟的指导下作为僧侣学习，并在世界范围内作为麒麟的代理人服务。麒麟的追随者可能会隐姓埋名地在各地旅行，寻找日益增长的邪恶的消息并在幕后工作，也可能是他们主人的事业的拥护者，在任何地方击败恶棍。

entries.name: Bringers of Boons
entries: Common folk consider ki-rins to be rare and remote heralds of good fortune. Seeing a ki-rin fly overhead is a blessing, and events that happen on such a day are especially auspicious. If a ki-rin alights during a ceremony, such as a birth announcement or a coronation, everyone present understands that the creature is telling them great good could be in the offing. The ki-rin conveys its gifts and omens, then rises back into the sky. Ki-rins have also been known to appear at the sites of great battles to inspire and strengthen the side of good, or to rescue heroes from certain death.

entries.name: Objects of Adoration
entries: Because a ki-rin is renowned for its wisdom, other creatures would naturally seek it out with questions and requests if they could. For that reason among others, the creature makes its lair atop a forbidding mountain peak or in some other equally inaccessible location. Only those that have the tenacity to complete the daunting journey to a ki-rin's lair can prove themselves worthy of speaking with its occupant.

entries.name: Lair of Luxury
entries: 在天体上，麒麟居住在崇高、优雅的房间里，里面充满了奢华的物品。在这个世界上，麒麟会选择一个类似的地点，比如在一个高大的山峰上，或者在一个由麒麟的魔法凝固的云中。从外面看，麒麟的巢穴与自然场所没有区别，而且游客很难找到和到达入口。在里面，巢穴是一个宁静而舒适的地方，其氛围是宫殿和寺庙的混合体。如果麒麟将生物纳入其服务范围，它的巢穴就会成为一个神圣的场所，麒麟不仅在这里休息，而且还教授神圣的奥秘。
哥布林龙盾是其种族的冠军。几乎所有的龙盾开始时都是普通的哥布林，然后被龙选中并赋予强大的力量以保护龙蛋，但每隔几年就会孵化出一个具有龙盾能力的先天版本的哥布林。它擅长徒手搏斗，身上有许多拼命搏斗的伤痕，并带着一个由废弃的龙鳞制成的盾牌。

entries.name: Uncommon Courage
entries: A dragonshield knows that it has a place of honor in the tribe, but-being kobolds at heart-most of them feel unworthy of their status and thus desperate to prove themselves deserving of it. A dragonshield's natural kobold cowardice is still present in its makeup, and thus it might still run away from a threat. But it also has the ability to rally in the face of certain death, inspiring other kobolds to follow it in a charge against the invaders of their warren.
一个哥布林发明家，狡猾且手脚麻利，建造了简易的武器，希望在战斗中获得一些新的优势。发明家捕捉虫子，舀起异国情调的地牢粘液，并要求将最好的赃物作为其实验的材料。它的作品有时在外观上很滑稽，但就像哥布林的陷阱一样，它们的效果比它们的材料所显示的要好很多。

entries.name: Good While They Last
entries: An inventor's new weapons last for only one or two attacks before they break, but might be surprisingly effective in the meantime. Most inventors are skilled enough that their improvised weapons don't backfire on them, but other users might not be so lucky. The weapons don't have to be lethal-in many cases one serves its purpose if it distracts, scares, or confuses a creature long enough for other kobolds to kill the enemy. In any particular encounter, an inventor usually has one or two improvised weapons at its disposal.
哥布林人的鳞片巫师在奥术方面具有与生俱来的天赋，这使得它成为部落中非常有价值的成员，原因有几个。由于哥布林的神灵仍然被囚禁着，大多数部落都缺乏能够使用神术的人，因此鳞片巫师就充当了顾问和历史学家的角色。在和平时期，他们用自己的法术来加固和加强战地，并帮助部落的其他成员。当部落受到威胁时，鳞片巫师会用火和毒药攻击敌人，为自己保留一点魔法，以备逃跑或利用俘虏的机会。

entries.name: Duty-Bound to a Dragon
entries: In a kobold tribe associated with a dragon, typically one that resides in or near the dragon's lair, the scale sorcerer also serves as diplomat and mouthpiece-anticipating the dragon's needs, issuing commands to other kobolds on the dragon's behalf, and reporting information back to the dragon. The sorcerer is just as awed by and respectful of dragons as common kobolds are, but it knows that its duty requires it not to fawn over its master at all times. It also understands that its frequent proximity to the dragon means it would probably be the first to die if its master became angry or displeased, and so it frantically maintains a balance between adoration and terror in its behavior toward the dragon.
千万不要因为哥布林很小就错误地认为它们很愚蠢或落后。尺寸与此毫无关系。
-Volo
科瑞德是不可预知的、神秘的精灵，与大地和石头有着密切的联系。由于他们有神奇的头发和对矿物的神秘理解，他们被寻宝者、矮人和其他渴望地底财富的人所追捧。

entries.name: Earthy Fey
entries: Korreds prefer to keep their own company and occasionally consort with creatures of elemental earth such as galeb duhr. A tribe of korreds gathers weekly to perform ceremonial dances, beating out rhythms on stone with their hooves and clubs. In the depths of the Material Plane, korreds typically flee from other creatures but become aggressive when they feel insulted or are annoyed by the sounds of mining.
科瑞德可以投掷远比他们看起来应该能够投掷的更大的巨石，把石头塑造成像粘土一样，在岩石中游泳，并召唤土元素和其他生物。他们还可以通过站在地上获得超自然的力量。
有一个关于一个商人的传说，他试图用金色的剪子剪掉Korred的头发。科瑞德把这些剪子喂给他，从他的燕子到他的坐骑。
-Volo

entries.name: Stone Sympathy
entries: No one knows the ways of stone and earth better than a korred. Korreds can seemingly smell veins of metal or gems. A korred on the surface can feel the rise and fall of bedrock under the earth and where caves lie, and underground it knows the pathways through the stone for miles. Secret doors that lead through stone are as obvious as windows to a korred.

entries.name: Enchanted Hair
entries: Korreds have hair all over their bodies, but the hair that grows from their heads is magical. When cut, it transforms into whatever material was used to cut it. Korreds use iron shears to cut lengths of their hair, then weave the strands together to create iron ropes that they can manipulate, animating them to bind or snake around creatures and objects. Korreds take great pride in their hair, and equally great offense at any one who attempts to cut it without permission.
对那些目睹了它的愤怒的人们来说，海怪可以看起来像神一样。那些把它的威力误认为是神力的人，以及那些试图通过崇拜来安抚怪物的人，有时会得到力量的奖励，并在此后作为克拉肯的祭司服务。
如果两者在同一个存在平面上，克拉肯可以让自己模糊地意识到克拉肯祭司的想法，然后它可以推开祭司的人格并控制它。海怪祭司因此可以充当其主人的眼睛和耳朵，当海怪有话要说时，祭司就会成为它的传声筒。
每个海怪祭司的外表都会发生变化，反映出海怪的影响，尽管每个人在展示其敬畏的方式上都有所不同。一个海怪祭司可能有一双墨黑的眼睛和一条被吸住的触手作为舌头，而另一个则有一张没有特征的脸和一个布满眼睛和嘴的身体，会滴下海水。当克拉肯附身在它的奴仆身上发表可怕的声明时，这些可怕的表现会更加强烈。
如果你把一只大獾的头、一个喜欢折磨和吃人的人的大脑、一只鹿的腿和一只大鬣狗的身体放在一起，用恶魔的胆汁使它们复活，而不去掩盖死亡的臭味，那么你就会得到一个leucrotta。

entries.name: Spawn of Yeenoghu
entries: The first leucrottas came into being alongside the gnolls during Yeenoghu's rampages on the Material Plane. Some of the hyenas that ate Yeenoghu's kills went through different transformations rather than turning into gnolls. Among these bizarre results, leucrottas were the most numerous.
聪明而又残忍，利库塔人喜欢欺骗、折磨和杀戮。由于利古塔比大多数地精更聪明、更强硬，它可以在地精部落中占据一个较高的位置。虽然利库塔不太可能领导一群地精，但它可以影响领导者，它甚至可能同意携带领导者参加战斗，并在战斗中提供建议。
地精把白鼬视为一种娱乐方式，部分原因是白鼬可以模仿痛苦的受害者的尖叫声--这种声音总是让地精感到快乐，即使没有受害者。此外，地精是嗜血和虐待狂，但由于其本性，无法延长杀人的乐趣。大多数地精都是有意识的残忍，以至于对自己的野蛮行为一丝不苟，把杀戮引向更好、更长久的运动。地精喜欢看白鼬的工作，几乎和他们喜欢自己杀人一样。
通常情况下，白鹦鹉的臭味会在其攻击前很久就警告猎物。然而，它有两个自然能力，使它具有优势。首先，白头翁的足迹几乎不可能与普通鹿的足迹相区别。其次，它可以复制它所听到的几乎所有生物的叫声或声音表达。这种怪物利用其模仿能力来引诱潜在的受害者，然后在他们感到困惑或没有意识到实际威胁的时候进行攻击。

entries.name: Foulness Embodied
entries: The leucrotta is so loathsome that only gnolls and others of its kind can stand to be around one for long. Its horrific, hodgepodge body oozes a foul stench that pollutes anywhere the creature lairs. This reek is outdone only by the creature's breath, which issues from a maw that drips fluid corrupted with rot and digestive juices. In place of fangs, a leucrotta has bony ridges as hard as steel that can crush bones and lacerate flesh. These plates are so tough that a leucrotta can use them to peel plate armor away from the body of a slain knight.
武术专家是经过广泛的徒手格斗训练的有纪律的僧侣。有些人保护寺院；有些人则周游世界，寻求开悟或掌握新的战斗形式。少数人成为保镖，用他们的战斗力和忠诚度换取食物和住宿。
盗贼大师以实施大胆的抢劫而闻名。他们往往会形成一种声誉和人格崇拜。盗贼大师可能会从实际工作中 "退休"，管理一个盗贼公会，领导一些秘密企业，或享受安静的奢侈生活。
恶魔领主创造了较小的恶魔，目的是在整个多元宇宙中散布混乱和恐怖。

entries.name: Maw Demon
entries: 颚魔与耶诺古一样，对屠杀和凡人的肉体有着无尽的饥渴。在口魔休息8小时后，任何被它吞噬的东西都会被直接送入野蛮人之主的口中。
颚魔出现在地精战队中，通常是作为向耶诺古献上新杀的人形生物的仪式的一部分而被召唤。地精并不指挥它们，但这些恶魔伴随着战队，并攻击地精们所遇到的任何生物。
Meenlocks是畸形的妖怪，它们会引起恐怖，并试图摧毁所有善良、无辜和美丽的东西。他们主要生活在森林中，尽管他们很适应城市和地下环境。

entries.name: Fear Incarnate
entries: Meenlocks are spawned by fear. Whenever fear overwhelms a creature in the Feywild, or in any other location where the Feywild's influence is strong, one or more meenlocks might spontaneously arise in the shadows or darkness nearby. If more than one meenlock is born, a lair also magically forms. The earth creaks and moans as narrow, twisting tunnels open up within it. One of these newly formed passageways serves as the lair's only entrance and exit.
蛤蚧让其他生物感到毛骨悚然，并投射出一种超自然的光环，给附近的人带来恐怖。它们是如此邪恶和扭曲，以至于那些闯入米恩洛克巢穴的人都有一种明显的不祥之感。在这个巢穴里，黑色的苔藓覆盖了每一个表面，使声音变得很低。一个大的中央房间是米诺克人的巢穴，他们在那里折磨俘虏。
白天，meenlocks把自己限制在他们黑暗的巢穴里。到了晚上，它们会爬出隧道，折磨沉睡的猎物，尤其是那些似乎体现了世界上所有美好事物的猎物。Meenlocks喜欢用它们的爪子麻痹生物，把它们拖回它们隐藏的巢穴，把它们打昏，并在几个小时内用心灵感应折磨它们。屈服于这种精神折磨的人，会转变为一个邪恶的、成熟的米诺克人（见 "心灵感应的折磨 "侧栏）。

entries.name: Dark Dwellers
entries: A meenlock shuns bright light. It can supernaturally sense areas of darkness and shadow in its vicinity and thus is able to teleport from one darkened space to another-enabling it to sneak up on its prey or run away when outmatched.

entries.name: Telepathic Tormentors
entries: Meenlocks have no form of communication other than telepathy. They can use it to project unsettling hallucinations into the minds of their prey. These hallucinations take the form of terrible whispers or fleeting movements just at the edges of one's peripheral vision.

entries.name: Telepathic Torment
entries: 最多四个meenlocks可以用心灵感应折磨一个{@condition incapacitated}的生物，用令人不安的声音和可怕的图像填充它的头脑。在这段时间内，参与的meenlocks不能为任何其他目的使用他们的心灵感应，尽管他们可以像正常人一样行动和做出反应。这种折磨对对{@condition frightened}条件免疫的生物没有影响。如果该生物易受影响，并在1小时内保持{@condition incapacitated}的状态，该生物必须进行智慧救赎，如果救赎失败，将受到10({@damage 3d6})的精神伤害，如果救赎成功，将受到一半的伤害。救赎DC是10+参与折磨的meenlocks的数量，只考虑那些在整个小时内都在受害者视线范围内的，并且在折磨过程中没有{@condition incapacitated}。这个过程可以重复进行。由于这种伤害而下降到0命中率的类人，会立即转化为一个完全健康并受DM控制的meenlock。只有{@spell wish}的法术或神明的干预才能将变身后的生物恢复到以前的状态。
心灵飞翔者有时会致力于深入研究幻术的力量，许多人擅长使用他们天生的幻术能量来复制施法。

entries.name: Mind Flayer
entries: 噬心者，也被称为illithids，是无数世界上有生命的生物的祸害。幻觉暴君、奴隶主和跨维航行者，他们是阴险的主谋，为了自己扭曲的目的收割整个种族。四条触手从它们章鱼般的头部蜿蜒而出，当有生命的生物靠近时，它们就会饥渴地弯曲。
在过去的岁月里，伊里特人控制着横跨许多世界的帝国。他们征服并因此扭曲了整个人形奴隶种族，包括githyanki和githzerai、grimlocks和kuo-toa。在集体意识的作用下，伊里希德人以其深不可测的头脑策划了影响深远的邪恶计划。
自从他们的帝国灭亡后，物质界的伊里特人集体就居住在暗黑世界。幻象指挥者。幻心者拥有幻觉的力量，使他们能够控制诸如troglodytes、grimlocks、quaggoths和食人魔等生物的思想。伊利特人更喜欢通过心灵感应进行交流，并在向他们的王族发布命令时使用他们的心灵感应。
当Illithid遇到强大的抵抗时，它就会避免最初的战斗，因为它命令它的王族去攻击。就像Illithid思想的物理延伸一样，这些鲛人在噬心者和它的敌人之间穿插，牺牲自己的生命，让它们的主人能够逃脱。

entries.name: Hive Mind Colonies
entries: Solitary mind flayers are likely rogues and outcasts. Most illithids belong to a colony of sibling mind flayers devoted to an elder brain-a massive brain-like being that resides in a briny pool near the center of a mind flayer community. From its pool, an elder brain telepathically dictates its desires to each individual mind flayer within 5 miles of it, for it is able to hold multiple mental conversations at once.
一个illithid在吞噬一个人形生物的大脑时，会体验到欣快感，同时还有它的记忆、个性和内心深处的恐惧。噬心者有时会收获一个大脑，而不是吞噬它，把它作为一些外星实验的一部分，或者把它转化为一个智力吞噬者。
奎里特
在极少的情况下，如果心灵传播者需要写下一些东西，他们就会用Qualith来做。这种触觉书写系统（类似于盲文）可以通过illithid的触手来阅读。Qualith是用四行诗句写成的，其结构非常奇怪，非illithids必须借助魔法才能辨别其含义。虽然Qualith可以用来保存记录，但illithids最常使用它来标记门户或其他表面的警告或指示。

entries.name: Hunger of the Mind
entries: Illithids subsist on the brains of humanoids. The brains provide enzymes, hormones, and psychic energy necessary for their survival. An illithid healthy from a brain-rich diet secretes a thin glaze of mucus that coats its mauve skin.
如果能够击晕持证人，并将其安全地带到长者大脑的盐水池中，就可以通过ceremorphosis将其转化为心灵证人。ceremorphosis的过程将beholder的四条眼线转化为类似于mind flayer的触角，并改变了beholder的一些眼射线。
心灵智障者的智力不如看护者，也不容易危害到殖民地，他们被打上了对长者大脑的虔诚和对伊利瑟德命令的服从的幻觉烙印，使他们几乎和智力吞噬者一样顺从。

entries.name: Telepathic Hub
entries: The primary function of a mindwitness is to improve telepathic communication in a mind flayer colony. A creature in telepathic communication with a mindwitness can converse telepathically through it to as many as seven other creatures the mindwitness can see, allowing the rapid spread of commands and other information.

entries.name: Solitary Seekers
entries: If separated from its illithid masters, a mindwitness seeks out other telepathic creatures to tell it what to do. Mindwitnesses have been known to ally with flumphs and telepathic planar beings such as demons, shifting their worldview and changing their alignment to match that of their new masters.
古老而狡猾的摩卡人是贪婪的收藏家。每个人都在各个星球上旅行，收集多元宇宙的贵重物品、怪异物品和弃物，使其收藏更加完整。

entries.name: Spawned by a God
entries: Long ago, a deity of greed and strife perished in the battles among the immortals. Its body drifted through the Astral Plane, eventually becoming a petrified husk. This corpse floated up against a pearlescent remnant of celestial matter imbued with life and life-giving magic. The collision shattered both objects and released a storm of chaotic energy. Countless islands of mixed matter spun away into the silvery void. Within some of them, a vein of pearl-like material held a bit of the deity's rejuvenated supernatural vitality, which spontaneously created a habitable environment. On those same islands, bits of the god's petrified flesh came back to life, in the form of tentacled monstrosities brimming with malice and greed. Ever since that time, each morkoth has had an extraplanar island to call home.
岛屿内部的珍珠状物质使它能够在平面气流上滑行，维持岛屿的环境，并使这个地方免受有害的外部影响。一个莫克特的岛屿可能在任何地方被发现，从海底到星界的虚空。一个人可以漂浮在九层地狱的阿弗纳斯的天空中而不被摧毁，也不会对其居民造成伤害。不管是在莫克特岛上还是在莫克特岛一定距离内的东西，都会随着它在各层面的旅程中旅行。因此，来自失落文明的人和过去时代的生物或物品都可能在莫克特的统治范围内被发现。
有些岛屿走的是特定的路线，在一个年轮中定期到达相同的目的地。其他的则与一个特定的地方或一群地方联系在一起，还有一些则在宇宙中无规律地移动。罕见的是，一个莫克特学会了控制其岛屿的移动，因此岛屿会去它的主人所希望的地方。

莫克特将时间花在监视它的收藏品和谋划获得更多财产上。这个怪物囤积了大量的财宝和知识。它的岛上有许多俘虏，它认为这是它的收藏品的一部分。一些居民，比如最初的囚犯的后代，可能会把莫科特视为统治者或神。当然，Morkoth的财富和传说的仓库吸引了可能的掠夺者，以及那些寻求Morkoth拥有或知道的特定东西的人。这种生物对那些试图从它那里偷东西的人毫不留情，但它可以和那些向莫克特提供它想要的东西的访问者讨价还价。
没有一个莫科特人可以自由地把它所拥有的东西送出去。摩卡人的存在是为了获取，只有当他们放弃财产有助于他们的囤积物增长时才会放弃。
Morkoth知道它收藏的每一件物品，并能在各个星球上追踪它的财产。敢于从莫克特身上偷东西的人，或破坏与莫克特的交易的人，在莫克特被杀或所有的承诺被履行之前，将不得安宁。
一切古怪、不寻常和有价值的东西的收藏家--希望不包括你。
-Volo

entries.name: No Rhyme or Reason
entries: A morkoth's island has the qualities of a dreamscape in which nature and predictability take a back seat to strangeness and chaos. Upon it is a jumble of objects and a mixture of creatures, some of which date from forgotten times. An island might have natural-looking illumination, but most are shrouded in twilight, and on any of them, mists and shadows can appear without notice. The environment is warm and wet, a subtropical or tropical climate that keeps the morkoth and its "guests" comfortable.

entries.name: Primeval Hoarders
entries: Morkoths are driven by greed and selfishness, mixed with a yearning for conflict. They desire anything they don't possess, have no scruples about taking what they crave, and endeavor to keep everything they collect.

entries.name: A Morkoth's Lair
entries: 一个莫可思人声称对整个岛屿拥有统治权，而且它还在该岛保持着一个中央圣殿。这个巢穴通常是一个由狭窄的隧道组成的扭曲网络，连接着几个地下房间，尽管也可能有其他结构形式。莫克特居住在它最珍贵的财产中，在巢穴核心的一个宽敞的穹顶里，岛上的珍珠状物质也在那里。巢穴的某些部分和中心可能保持干燥，以更好地保护和保存收集的物品和生物，但巢穴的大部分都在水下。
在其巢穴中遇到的莫科特，其挑战等级为12（8,400XP）。
山地巨人知道哪种食物会使他们变胖，他们也明白，过度劳累往往会使他们变瘦。这些懒惰的畜生不理解的是使他们生病的东西。他们像孩子们吃甜点一样热情地食用变质的食物和生病的尸体。幸运的是，山地巨人拥有秃鹫般的体质，很少因为这种饮食习惯而受到伤害。这使得当他们中的一个人生病并无法维持食物时，对他们来说就更加神秘了。呕吐的山地巨人被看作是来自Grolantor的信息的容器。
族人将生病的巨人与其他人分开，通常将巨人困在笼子里或将巨人绑在柱子上。Grolantor的牧师或酋长每天都会去看望饥肠辘辘的巨人，试图从山丘巨人呕出的一滩滩胆汁中读出预兆。如果病痛很快就会过去，山丘巨人就可以重新加入社会了。如果没有，山丘巨人反而会被饿得发狂，这样Grolantor的饥饿就可以在这个世界上得到一个口。

entries.name: Starved and Insane
entries: A mouth of Grolantor is so disgraced that it ceases to be an individual and becomes an object. Paradoxically, that object is revered as a holy embodiment of Grolantor's eternal, aching hunger. Unlike a typical thick, sluggish, half-asleep hill giant, a mouth of Grolantor is thin as a whippet, alert like a bird, and constantly twitching around the edges. A mouth of Grolantor is kept perpetually imprisoned or shackled; if it breaks free, it's sure to kill a few hill giants before it's brought down or it sprints away on a killing spree. The only time a mouth of Grolantor is set loose is during a war, a raid against an enemy settlement, or in a last-ditch defense of the tribe's home. When the mouth of Grolantor has slaughtered and eaten its fill of the tribe's enemies, it passes out amid the gory remains of its victims, making it easy to recapture.
亡灵巫师是研究生命、死亡和不死的互动关系的专业巫师。有些人喜欢挖出尸体，制造不死的奴隶。少数人利用他们的力量做好事，成为亡灵猎人，冒着生命危险去拯救他人。
Neogi是可恨的奴隶主，他们认为大多数其他生物，甚至是弱小的Neogi，都是仆人和猎物。Neogi看起来像一只大蜘蛛，有一个鳗鱼的脖子和头。这种生物可以毒害其目标的身体和思想，能够征服其他在身体上有优势的生物。

entries.name: Alien Tyrants
entries: Neogi usually dwell in far-flung locations on the Material Plane, as well as in the Feywild, the Shadowfell, and the Astral and Ethereal Planes. They invaded the world long ago from a remote location on the Material Plane, abandoning their home to conquer and devour creatures in other realms. To meet their need to navigate great distances, the neogi first dominated and assimilated the umber hulks of another lost world. Then, with these slaves providing the physical labor, the neogi designed and built sleek vessels, some capable of traversing the planes, to carry them to their new frontiers. Some neogi groups still create and use such vehicles, which have a distinct spidery aspect.
有些neogi使用魔法--这是neogi和他们在离开母体世界的旅途中遇到的反常实体之间的约定的结果。这些实体看起来像星星，体现了邪恶的本质。他们的名字是Acamar、Caiphon、Gibbeth和Hadar等。
关于neogi，没有什么比他们的心态更深不可测了。因为他们有控制思想的能力，Neogi认为这样做是完全合适的。他们的社会对个人没有任何区别，除了一个特定的生物具有控制他人的能力之外，他们不理解人类和类似生命所经历的存在的情感方面。对Neogi来说，仇恨和爱一样是一种陌生的感觉，而在没有权威的情况下表现出忠诚是愚蠢的。
Neogi通过使用染料、变形魔法和纹身来标记他们自己和他们的奴隶，旨在表示等级、成就和所有权。通过这些标志，每个Neogi都能识别出它的优胜者--它必须服从于那些地位更高的人，否则就会受到严厉的惩罚。
该死的鳗鱼蜘蛛想奴役我们所有人！？而且，它们的味道并不好。
-Volo

在仆人对主人的义务之外，Neogi愿意从事任何能使他们获利的活动，而且在这样做的时候，他们像魔鬼一样狡猾。Neogi进行买卖，但他们对潜在的主顾构成严重的风险，而这些主顾可能反而容易被奴役，所以他们的客户一般由绝望的人或邪恶的人组成，或者是那些足以与Neogi平等相待的生物。Neogi商人可能会在一个平面集市、一个乌鸦城市的边缘、或靠近一个精神分裂者的飞地开店。在其他地方，当地人更有可能联合起来摧毁一个Neogi商队，而不是让它安全通行并获得贸易特权。

entries.name: Cycle of Death and Life
entries: A neogi lives about as long as a human, and like a human it faces physical and mental infirmity as it ages. When an individual is rendered weak by advanced age, the other neogi in the group overpower it and inject it with a special poison. The toxin transforms the old neogi into a bloated, helpless mass of flesh called a great old master. Young neogi lay their eggs atop it, and when the hatchlings emerge, they devour the great old master and one another, until only a few of the strongest newborns are left.

entries.name: Hierarchy of Ownership
entries: Surviving neogi hatchlings begin their lives under the control of adult neogi. They must learn about their society and earn a place in it, and each one starts its training by gaining mastery over a young umber hulk.

一种体积巨大的粘液包裹的蠕虫，新铁皮人是心智障碍者繁殖周期出了可怕的问题的结果。在极少数情况下，一个illithid群落会崩溃，通常是在受到外部攻击后，老脑被杀死。当这种情况发生时，群体中的蝌蚪突然从他们的命运中解放出来。它们不再作为食物，反过来也不再被它们的看护者喂养。在饥饿的驱使下，它们转而相互吞噬。群体池中的数千只蝌蚪中，只有一只蝌蚪幸存下来，它成为了新潮汐动物。

entries.name: Abhorrent to Illithids
entries: Among the strongest taboos in illithid society is the idea of allowing a mature tadpole to survive without implanting it into a donor brain. Under normal circumstances, any tadpole that grows larger than a few inches in length is killed by the elder brain to be food for it or for less mature tadpoles. Any tadpole that survives beyond that state is perceived as a threat to the colony, and the mind flayers organize hunting parties to exterminate the abomination. Lacking enough intelligence to be detected by an elder brain's power to sense thoughts, neothelids warrant such precautions.

entries.name: Savage Behemoth
entries: As a feral thing, a neothelid knows nothing beyond the predatory existence it has lived so far and struggles to comprehend its new psionic abilities. Neothelids prowl subterranean passages in search of more brains to sate their constant hunger, growing ever more vicious. These creatures can spray tissue-dissolving enzymes from their tentacle ducts, reducing victims to a puddle of slime and leaving only the pulsing brain unharmed. They have no knowledge of their link to illithids, so they're just as likely to prey on mind flayers as on anything else.

当马格鲁比耶特征服了地精之神时，他打算只留下胡戈尔巴耶格一个人活着，作为一个严厉的监督者，将地精控制在脚下。但地精的神殿里有一个诡计多端的神，他决心要笑到最后。虽然它的本质被马格鲁比耶击碎了，但这个诡计多端的神以分裂的形式存活下来，当地精形成一个宿主时，它就会出现，除非它被安抚，否则会造成队伍的混乱。妖精们没有这个神的名字，也不敢给它起名字，以免马格卢比耶特用它的名字来迷惑和压制它，就像他对其他神灵一样。他们把附身的灵魂和被它附身的妖精称为nilbog（"妖精 "倒过来拼），他们陶醉于nilbog在主人的虫人和妖精队伍中播下的恐惧。

entries.name: Goblins' Revenge
entries: When goblinoids form a host, there is a chance that a goblin will become possessed by a nilbog, particularly if the goblin has been mistreated by its betters. This possession turns the goblin into a wisecracking, impish creature fearless of reprisal. It gives the goblin strange powers that drive others to do the opposite of what they desire. Attacking a goblin possessed by a nilbog is foolhardy, and killing the creature just prompts the spirit to possess another goblin. The only way to keep a nilbog from wreaking havoc is to treat it well and give it respect and praise.

entries.name: No Joking Matter
entries: The possible presence of a nilbog in a host has given rise to a practice among goblinoids that each host include at least one goblin jester. This jester is allowed to go anywhere and do whatever it pleases. The position of jester is a much sought-after one among the goblins, because even if the jester is obviously not a nilbog, hobgoblins and bugbears indulge its manic behavior.

entries.name: Nilbogism
entries: 尼尔博格是一种无形的精神，只附身于地精。由于没有宿主，它的飞行速度为30英尺，不能说话也不能被攻击。它唯一可以采取的行动是试图附身在它5英尺范围内的妖精。

被鬼魂锁定的地精必须在DC15的魅力投掷中获得成功，否则就会被附身。在被鬼魂附身的时候，地精的方向变成混乱的邪恶，它的魅力变成15（除非它本来就更高），并获得尼尔博格的先天法术和尼尔博格的特性，以及它的命运逆转反应。如果救赎成功，该灵魂在24小时内不能附身于该地精。如果它的宿主被杀，或者被一个咒语结束了附身，比如 "神圣"、"魔法阵 "或 "避邪 "和 "善"，那么这个灵魂就会寻找另一个妖精来附身。灵魂可以在任何时候离开它的宿主，但它不会自愿这么做，除非它知道附近有另一个潜在的宿主。被剥夺了尼尔博格精神的地精会恢复到正常的统计数字，并失去它在被附身时获得的特性。
对于世界上的普通人来说，兽人就是兽人。他们知道，这些野蛮人中的任何一个都能把一个普通人撕成碎片，所以没有必要进一步区分。
兽人更清楚。一个部落里有不同的兽人群体，每个人的行动都由他们所崇拜的神灵决定。为了补充那些涌现出来的蹂躏乡村的各种战士，每个部落都有成员留在巢穴深处，很少看到他们巢穴的黑暗之外的东西。
此外，兽人与两种有时会出现在他们身边的生物有着特殊的关系：一种是大公牛，作为崇尚巴格鲁的战士的坐骑；另一种是塔纳鲁克，一种恶魔与兽人的杂交品种，它是如此堕落和具有破坏性，甚至兽人都想杀死它。附录A中描述了欧罗巴的情况。塔纳鲁克的描述见下文。

entries.name: Orc Blade of Ilneval
entries: 伊尔内瓦尔是格鲁姆什的战斗队长，他是一个狡猾的战略家，大胆地指挥格鲁姆什的士兵。在兽人中，崇尚伊尔内瓦尔的战士会效仿他们的神灵。这样的兽人学会了以不可预测的方式指挥他们的同伴，但有助于确保胜利。
这些领导人中最聪明的人获得了伊尔内瓦尔的青睐，并成为著名的刀锋战士，这些战术专家在战争问题上为他们的首领提供建议。刀锋从前面带路，无畏地涉入战斗，同时向较小的士兵发号施令。刀锋知道如何利用兽人的凶猛来发挥最大的优势，并帮助普通战士共同对付他们的对手。

entries.name: Orc Claw of Luthic
entries: 卢斯克是格鲁姆什的妻子，也是所有兽人眼中的母性典范。她是洞穴之母，一个居住在黑暗中的凶猛的人，她将新的兽人幼崽培养成凶恶和强壮。她的象征是洞熊，兽人女性在养育兽人幼崽的同时也养育这样的熊。被卢瑟克特别吸引的女性会长出长长的指甲，并给它们涂上漆，学会用这些爪子作为武器，就像卢瑟克用她自己的一样。

此外，兽人与两种有时会出现在他们身边的生物有着特殊的关系：一种是大公牛，作为崇尚巴格鲁的战士的坐骑；另一种是塔纳鲁克，一种恶魔与兽人的杂交品种，它是如此堕落和具有破坏性，甚至兽人都想杀死它。附录A中描述了欧罗巴的情况。塔纳鲁克的描述见下文。

entries.name: Orc Hand of Yurtrus
entries: 尤尔图斯是兽人的死亡和疾病之神。他是一个可怕的憎恶，浑身都是腐烂和感染，除了他完美、光滑的白手。
监督生死线的兽人祭司被部落里的其他人称为尤特鲁斯之手。他们居住在兽人巢穴的边缘地带，通常通过追随卢斯克的人的主持与其他兽人进行交流。尤特鲁斯之手戴着由其他人类（最好是精灵）的漂白皮肤制成的苍白手套，象征着他们与尤特鲁斯的联系，因此有时被称为 "白手"。
每个兽人都知道，尤特鲁斯的手是部落通往祖先的通道。那些为部落效力而死的兽人，都会参加旨在将他们送往格鲁姆什领域的仪式。
作为一个不说话的神的追随者，尤特鲁斯的手摘掉了他们的舌头，以效仿他们的神，其原因类似于格鲁姆什的眼睛为什么要摘掉它的一只眼睛。

entries.name: Orc Nurtured One of Yurtrus
entries: 当瘟疫袭击一个部落时，尤特鲁斯的手将病人隔离。然后祭司们为那些可以被拯救但不能被治愈的人服务。手培养这些被培养者的疾病，把他们变成防御的工具和战争的武器。当兽人参战时，一队受孕者可能会首先冲锋陷阵--在软化敌人的同时，在其队伍中散播尤特鲁斯的卑鄙祝福。
对于世界上的普通人来说，兽人就是兽人。他们知道，这些野蛮人中的任何一个都能把一个普通人撕成碎片，所以没有必要进一步区分。

entries.name: Orc Red Fang of Shargaas
entries: Shargaas是兽人的深层黑暗和阴险的神，是一个杀人不眨眼的神，憎恨任何不是兽人的生命。兽人认为Shargaas是一个适合于贱民和弱者的神，他们都不适合在部落生活中扮演真正的角色。这些外来者生活在部落领域的最偏远、最深的地方。
沙迦斯的追随者中的精英是追随红方邪教的刺客和盗贼。他们代表部落执行暗杀、隐蔽的突袭和其他秘密行动。他们依靠密集的训练和沙迦斯赋予他们的魔法。
大多数 "红獠牙 "飞地都饲养和培育巨型蝙蝠，这些生物对沙加斯来说是神圣的。红番族人骑着这些蝙蝠参加战斗，或执行秘密突袭和暗杀任务，进入敌人的领土。
一头牛主要用于起草工作，而不是肉类或牛奶。
这种翼龙的巨型亲戚，翼展超过30英尺。虽然它可以像四足动物一样在地面上移动，但它在空中更加舒适。
快车在鬼魅的、扭曲的森林中飞驰，在那里，无论是在精灵世界还是在这个世界上，都有不知名的精灵在操控着。奔跑的速度超过了眼睛所能追踪的范围，每个人都只是在空气中出现了一个模糊的晃动。
快灵是一种小而纤细的费伊人，类似于微型的精灵，具有尖锐、野性的特征。它冷酷无情的眼睛像珠宝一样闪闪发光。

entries.name: Live Fast, Die Young
entries: Quicklings owe their existence-and their plight-to the Queen of Air and Darkness, the dread ruler of the Gloaming Court. Once a race of lazy and egotistical fey, the creatures that would become the quicklings were late in answering the queen's summons one time too many. To hasten their pace and teach them to mind her will, the queen shrank their stature and sped up their internal clocks. The queen's curse gave quicklings their amazing speed but also accelerated their passage through life-no quickling lives longer than fifteen years.
对其他生物来说，快灵似乎快得令人眼花缭乱，随着它的移动而消失，变成一个模糊不清的东西。它残忍的笑声是一阵阵快速的咯噔声，它的说话声是尖锐的尖叫声。只有当一个快活的人故意放慢速度时（它宁愿不这么做），其他的人才能正确地看到、听到和理解它。一个 "静止的 "快灵从来没有真正的休息过，它不断地在原地踱步和移动，仿佛它迫不及待地想再次离开。
然而，这类伎俩并不是他们艺术性的恶意的极限。他们不会直接杀人，但快活人可以用很多其他方式毁掉生活：偷重要的信、盗取为穷人募集的硬币、在别人的包里放上偷来的东西。快活人喜欢造成的痛苦超越了单纯的误导，特别是当他们的行为的责任落在其他生物身上并造成不和谐时。

entries.name: Too Fast for Words
entries: The mortal realm is a ponderous place to a quickling's eye: a hurricane creeps gradually across the sky, a torrent of rain drifts earthward like lazy snowflakes, lightning crawls in a meandering path from cloud to cloud. The slow and boring world seems to be populated by torpid creatures whose deep, mooing speech lacks meaning.

entries.name: Mischief, Not Murder
entries: Quicklings have a capricious nature that goes well with their energy level: they think as fast as they run, and they are always up to something. A quickling spends most of its time perpetrating acts of mischief on slower creatures. One rarely passes up an opportunity to tie a person's bootlaces together, move the stool a creature is about to sit on, or unbuckle a saddle while no one's looking.
红帽是一种因血欲而生的嗜杀性费伊生物。红帽虽然小，但有强大的力量，他们利用这些力量毫不犹豫地进行猎杀，也不后悔。

entries.name: Blood Lust Personified
entries: In the Feywild, or where that plane touches the world at a fey crossing, if a sentient creature acts on an intense desire for bloodshed, one or more redcaps might appear where the blood of a slain person soaks the ground. At first, new red caps look like tiny bloodstained mushrooms just pushing their caps out of the soil. When moonlight shines on one of these caps, a creature that looks like a wizened and undersized gnome with a hunched back and a sinewy frame springs from the earth. The creature has a pointed leather cap, pants of similar material, heavy iron boots, and a heavy bladed weapon. From the moment it awakens, a redcap desires only murder and carnage, and it sets out to satisfy these cravings.
红帽子缺乏微妙性。它们为直接对抗和致命战斗的混乱而活。即使红帽想隐身，它的铁靴也迫使它采取深思熟虑的、雷鸣般的步伐。不过，当红帽接近潜在的猎物时，它可以迅速拉近距离，在目标做出反应之前，狠狠地挥动它的武器。
此外，一些红帽可以感知导致其诞生的谋杀行为的存在。红帽可能会利用这种与生俱来的联系来找到它的创造者，并让那个生物成为它的第一个受害者。其他人则寻找他们的创造者，以享受与同类精神的亲近。一个负责在同一地点创造多个红帽的人可以吸引整个群体作为同伙，模仿那个生物的谋杀行为。
在任何情况下，如果一个红帽与另一个生命一起工作，红帽要求以受害者的身份得到报酬。试图扼杀红帽对血的自然和必要的冲动的赞助人有可能成为红帽的下一个目标。
就像甩出的战斧一样微妙。
-Volo

entries.name: Steeped in Slaughter
entries: To sustain its unnatural existence, a redcap has to soak its hat in the fresh blood of its victims. When a redcap is born, its hat is coated with wet blood, and it knows that if the blood isn't replenished at least once every three days, the redcap vanishes as if it had never been. A redcap's desire to slay is rooted in its will to survive.

entries.name: Bloodthirsty Mercenaries
entries: Redcaps don't usually operate in groups, but in some circumstances they might be fond in the employ of hags and dark mages that know methods to call redcaps out of the Feywild and put them to work as grisly servants.
普通的罗特犬类似于麝香牛，有（%0%）出30英尺的范围。
深层罗瑟是发育不良的地下城变种（%0%）。
许多故事都是作为海誓山盟来唱的，在码头酒馆里作为故事流传，讲述的是人们在大海中失去的故事，但不仅仅是被淹死和消失。这些不幸的人被海洋带走，作为海中的卵子继续生存，在海浪中徘徊，就像他们以前的自我的折磨的反映。珊瑚包裹着他们。藤壶依附在他们冰冷的皮肤上。曾经充满空气的肺现在也可以在水中呼吸了。
传说为这些奇怪的转变提供了无数的理由。有人说："要警惕爱上一个海精灵或人鱼，"有人说。"在暴风雨来临之前回到港口，无论渔获多么诱人。" "按照海神的要求向他们致敬，但永远不要向他们承诺你的心。" 这样的警示故事掩盖了更深层次的事实：在海浪之下潜伏着一些东西，它们努力地要求陆地居民的心和思想。

entries.name: Deep Thralls
entries: Krakens, morkoths, sea hags, marids, storm giants, dragon turtles-all of these sea creatures and more can mark mortals as their own and claim them as minions. Such people might become beholden to their master through a bleak bargain, or they might find themselves cursed by such creatures. Once warped into a fishlike form, the person can't leave the sea for long without courting death.

entries.name: Anatomical Diversity
entries: Sea spawn come in a wide variety of forms. An individual might have a tentacle for an arm, the jaws of a shark, a sea urchin's spines, a whale's fin, octopus eyes, seaweed hair, or any combination of such qualities. Some sea spawn have piscine body parts that provide them with special abilities beyond those of an ordinary humanoid.

entries.name: The Sea Spawn of Purple Rocks
entries: 来到一串被称为紫岩的岛屿（在《被遗忘的领域》中）的游客可能会注意到关于岛上人类居民的一个奇怪的事实：他们中没有婴儿或老人。这是因为洛克人所生的婴儿会被扔进海里，被一只名叫斯拉克雷特尔的海怪领走。这种经历使孩子们变成了献给海怪的狂热分子。他们从海里回来时是人类，但当他们年老时，就会变成海中的卵子，在黑暗的深处与他们的主人会合。有些孩子在回来时经历了部分转变，使他们成为半兽人，直到他们年老时完全转变。这些可怜虫被隐藏起来，直到他们的最终转变，以保持紫岩的秘密。
海怪祭司（在附录B中描述）是海怪羊群的照料者。大多数祭司是岛上的土著，但也有一些是生活在紫岩周围水域的人鱼族、人鱼族或海精灵。
这些阴影城的黑色猎犬在阴影中无形地移动，总是在追捕。在阴影地带和物质世界之间的面纱最薄的阴暗地方，它们可以穿越到世界的黑暗领域。

entries.name: Ravenous Lurkers
entries: Shadow mastiffs hunt in packs on the Shadowfell, so when one of them enters a rift between the planes, several more are sure to follow. Each pack is led by an alpha (male or female) that is the smartest and toughest one of the group. The alpha must remain sharp to keep the rest of the pack in line, lest it be killed and replaced.
当影獒群饿了，感觉到附近有猎物时，首领就会发出嚎叫，让附近的野兽和人类感到恐惧。它的嚎叫声也是向狼群的其他成员发出的信号，让他们进场捕杀。阴霾为影獒提供了超自然的保护，使它在昏暗的光线或黑暗中能抵抗非魔法武器的攻击。影獒可以忍受明亮的光线，但它们回避阳光。

entries.name: Summoned for Service
entries: Some faiths devoted to deities of gloom and night, such as Shar in the Forgotten Realms, perform unholy rites to summon shadow mastiffs from the Shadowfell and then put them to work as temple sentinels, bodyguards, and punishers of nonbelievers, heretics, and apostates. The method for bringing shadow mastiffs into the world is also known by other strong-willed and evil-minded individuals, who find use for the hounds as guards in their strongholds.

entries.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: In addition to its other capabilities, a shadow mastiff can see creatures and objects on the Ethereal Plane. This extraplanar perception makes a mastiff an especially skilled guardian, especially in situations when magical or spiritual incursion is likely.
恶魔领主创造了较小的恶魔，目的是在整个多元宇宙中散布混乱和恐怖。

entries.name: Shoosuva
entries: 苏瓦是耶诺古赠送给一个特别强大的地精的鬣狗妖（通常作为耶诺古的獠牙）。在一个战队取得巨大胜利后不久，苏瓦就会显现出来，当它从深渊中来到这里时，会从一团翻滚的、腥臭的烟雾中出现。在战斗中，恶魔用它那贪婪的大嘴咬住一个受害者，同时用它尾巴上的毒刺将另一个受害者击倒。被毒药困住的生物很容易成为附近的地精们的猎物。
每一个shosuva都与一个特定的地精联系在一起，并与它的主人一起战斗。在一个战队中，被赋予了shoosuva的地精在地位上仅次于弗林德。
对复仇的追求有时会导致一个人经历一种仪式，在这种仪式中，他们会变成一个半液态的有意识的身体，被称为滑行追踪者。追踪者既无害又阴险，它可以进入普通生物无法进入的地方，并将自己的水样死亡带到猎物身上。

entries.name: Vengeance at Any Cost
entries: The ritual for creating a slithering tracker is known to hags, liches, and priests who worship gods of vengeance. It can only be performed on a willing creature that hungers for revenge. The ritual sucks all the moisture from the person's body, killing it. Yet the mind lives on in the puddle of liquid that issues forth from the remains, and so too does the subject's insatiable need for retribution.

entries.name: Stealthy Assassins
entries: A slithering tracker tastes the ground it courses over, seeking any trace of its prey. To kill, a slithering tracker rises up and enshrouds a creature, attempting to drown the prey while also draining it of blood. A slithering tracker that has killed in this fashion becomes much easier to locate for a time, since its liquid form becomes tinged with blood and its body leaves a visible trail of the stuff behind it.

entries.name: Descent into Madness
entries: Achieving revenge against its target doesn't end a slithering tracker's existence, nor its hunger for blood. Some slithering trackers remain aware of their purpose and extend their quest for vengeance to others, such as anyone who supported or befriended the original target. Most of the time, though, a tracker's mind can't cope with being trapped in liquid form, unable to communicate, and driven by the desire for blood: after a tracker fulfills its duty, insanity takes over the creature, and it attacks indiscriminately until it is destroyed.
凯斯（Kyuss）是奥库斯（Orcus）的一个大祭司，他从尸库中掠夺尸体来创造凯斯的第一个卵子。即使在库斯死后几个世纪，他的疯狂弟子仍在继续执行他所完善的恐怖仪式。

entries.name: Plague of Worms
entries: From a distance or in poor light, a spawn of Kyuss looks like an ordinary zombie. As it comes into clearer view, one can see scores of little green worms crawling in and out of it. These worms jump onto nearby humanoids and burrow into their flesh. A worm that penetrates a humanoid body makes its way to the creature's brain. Once inside the brain, the worm kills its host and animates the corpse, transforming it into a spawn of Kyuss that breeds more worms. The dead humanoid's soul remains trapped inside the corpse, preventing the individual from being raised or resurrected until the undead body is destroyed. The horror of being a soul imprisoned in an undead body drives a spawn of Kyuss insane.

entries.name: Corruption Without End
entries: Spawn of Kyuss are expressions of Orcus's intent to replace all life with undeath. Left to its own devices, a solitary spawn of Kyuss travels aimlessly. If it stumbles across a living creature, the spawn attacks with the sole intent of creating more spawn. Whether they are dispersed or clustered, spawn reproduce exponentially if nothing stops them.

entries.name: Undead Nature
entries: Spawn of Kyuss require no air, food, drink, or sleep.
这种身材魁梧的恐龙背上有一排排的板块，有一条灵活的、带刺的尾巴高高举起，以打击捕食者。它倾向于在混合年龄段的群体中旅行。
这些橙色和绿色的错体野牛原产于下层星球。
世界的表面对石巨人来说是一个陌生的领域：波动的、暂时的、暴露在阵风和骤雨中。它就像一个梦一样变化无常，他们就是这样看待它--一个梦。那里没有任何东西是永久的，所以那里没有任何东西是真实的。表面上发生的事情并不重要。在那里做出的承诺和交易不需要兑现。生命甚至艺术在那里的价值较低。

entries.name: Dream Dwellers
entries: Stone giants sometimes go on dream quests in the surface world, seeking inspiration for their art, to break a decades-long ennui, or out of simple curiosity. Some who go on these quests let themselves become lost in the dream. Other stone giants are banished to the surface as punishment. Regardless of the reason, if they don't take shelter under stone, such individuals can become dreamwalkers.
梦游者在石巨人条例之外占据了一个奇怪的尊重位置。他们被认为是被遗弃的，但他们对表面世界的熟悉使他们成为有价值的向导，他们的洞察力可以帮助其他石巨人掌握生活在梦中的危险性。

entries.name: Mad Wanderers
entries: Dreamwalkers are driven mad by isolation, shame, and their unendingly alien surroundings, and this madness leeches out into the world around them, affecting other creatures that get too close. Believing that they're living in a dream and that their actions have no real consequences, dreamwalkers act as they please, becoming forces of chaos. As they travel the world, they collect objects and creatures that seem especially significant in their mad minds. Over time, the collected things accrete to their bodies, becoming encased in stone.
为了防止不可避免的情况发生，一些接近自然寿命终点的风暴巨人寻求逃离死亡。他们挖掘自己与元素的强大联系的深度，将自己分散到自然界中，真正变成了半意识的风暴。在一座山峰周围无休止地肆虐的暴风雪，在一个遥远的岛屿周围旋转的漩涡，或者在崎岖的海岸线上无休止地嚎叫的雷暴，事实上，可能是一个风暴巨人坚持存在的不死形态。

entries.name: Elemental Weapons
entries: A storm giant quintessent sheds its armor and weapons, but gains the power to form makeshift weapons out of thin air. When the giant has no further use of them, or when the giant dies, its elemental weapons disappear.

entries.name: Forsaken Form
entries: A storm giant quintessent can revert to its true giant form on a whim. The change is temporary but can be maintained long enough for the giant to communicate with a mortal, carry out a short task, or defend its home against aggressors.

entries.name: A Quintessent's Lair
entries: 一个风暴巨人的五脏六腑不需要城堡或地牢的巢穴。它的巢穴通常是一个僻静的地区或突出的地理特征，如一座山峰、一个大瀑布、一个遥远的岛屿、一个雾气笼罩的湖泊、一个美丽的珊瑚礁，或一个风吹草动的沙漠悬崖。与环境相称，巨人所处的风暴可能是暴风雪、台风、雷暴或沙尘暴。
腐烂的蛴螬是手指大小的蛆虫，吃活的或死的肉，尽管它们可以在植物上生存。它们侵扰尸体和成堆的腐烂物质，并攻击干扰它们的生物。腐烂的蛴螬钻进生物的肉里后，本能地朝心脏方向咀嚼，以杀死其主人。

腐烂的蛴螬无论是单独还是成群结队都会构成威胁。关于腐烂蛴螬群的机制，请参见随附的状态块。单个的腐烂蛴螬没有状态块。任何接触到它的生物都必须做一个DC10的灵巧蓄力动作。如果救赎失败，腐烂的蛴螬会钻进生物的肉里，并在宿主生物的每个回合开始时造成3({@damage 1d6})的穿刺伤害。在宿主生物的下一回合结束前对伤口施以火焰，对宿主造成1次火焰伤害，并杀死侵袭的腐烂蛴螬。在这段时间之后，腐烂的蛴螬在宿主生物的皮肤下太远而无法被烧死。如果被一只或多只腐烂的蛴螬侵扰的生物在其回合结束时命中率为0，那么它就会死，因为这些蛴螬会钻进它的心脏并杀死它。任何治疗疾病的效果都会杀死侵扰目标的所有腐生蛴螬。焚烧尸体可以杀死侵扰它的任何腐生蛴螬。
游侠是迷人的新手，他们按照自己的荣誉准则生活。他们渴望臭名远扬，经常沉溺于浪漫的尝试，并以海盗和海盗为生，很少在一个地方停留太久。
对于世界上的普通人来说，兽人就是兽人。他们知道，这些野蛮人中的任何一个都能把一个普通人撕成碎片，所以没有必要进一步区分。
兽人更清楚。一个部落里有不同的兽人群体，每个人的行动都由他们所崇拜的神灵决定。为了补充那些涌现出来的蹂躏乡村的各种战士，每个部落都有成员留在巢穴深处，很少看到他们巢穴的黑暗之外的东西。
此外，兽人与两种有时会出现在他们身边的生物有着特殊的关系：一种是大公牛，作为崇尚巴格鲁的战士的坐骑；另一种是塔纳鲁克，一种恶魔与兽人的杂交品种，它是如此堕落和具有破坏性，甚至兽人都想杀死它。附录A中描述了欧罗巴的情况。塔纳鲁克的描述见下文。

entries.name: Tanarukk
entries: 当恶魔的腐败玷污了一个部落的领导层时，兽人可能会转向深渊魔法来制造Tanarukks。控制兽人的邪恶人类也会利用这种力量来增强其追随者的力量。
恶魔领主巴弗灭很乐意与那些恳求他给予权力的人分享创造塔纳鲁克的秘密。这个过程腐蚀了部落中未出生的兽人，使其一出生就变成了比兽人更野蛮的生物。
尽管塔纳鲁克人是可怕的战士，但他们在战场之外也会对他们的盟友构成威胁。在部落的巢穴中，塔纳鲁克具有破坏性和不稳定性，最好被囚禁起来。迟早有一天，一个自由的塔纳鲁克会在部落里横冲直撞，试图用武力接管。大多数这样的政变都会失败，但会给部落带来巨大损失。如果Tanarukk确实夺取了一个部落的领导权，那么不计后果的战争是它不可避免地选择的路线。
如果tanarukk设法繁殖，它的血液会玷污无数的后代，所以它的女性后代会随机产生tanarukk。为了避免养育天生的tanarukk的风险，大多数部落都会杀死这种可憎的东西。
素食者是一种真菌生物，他们生活在简单的部落单元中，以狩猎为生，并传播他们赖以繁殖的孢子。

entries.name: Primitive Plants
entries: Vegepygmies, also called mold folk or moldies, inhabit dark areas that are warm and wet, so they are most commonly found underground or in dense forests where little sunlight penetrates. A vegepygmy instinctively feels kinship with other plant and fungus creatures, and thus vegepygmy tribes coexist well with creatures such as myconids, shriekers, and violet fungi.
虽然它们更喜欢吃新鲜的肉、骨头和血，但素食者可以从土壤和许多种类的有机物中吸收营养，这意味着它们很少挨饿。素食者可以发出嘶嘶声，并通过嘴里的空气发出其他声音，但它不能在传统意义上说话。在它们之间，vegepygmies通过嘶嘶声、手势和有节奏地敲击身体来交流。维格米人很少建造和制作；他们拥有的任何装备都是从其他生物那里获得的，或者是通过复制他们所看到的简单结构来建造的。
随着vegepygmy年龄的增长，它变得更加坚韧，并在其身上长出了孢子群。含有孢子的vegepygmies会受到其他vegepygmies的尊重，所以外人把这种vegepygmies称为首领。首领可以爆发性地排出它的孢子，感染附近的生物。如果一个生物在被感染时死亡，它的尸体会像赤霉病一样产生蔬果虫。
没有人知道赤霉病是怎么来的。有一个历史记载说，冒险家们在一个令人望而却步的山脉中发现了赤霉菌，并在一个充满奇特生命的金属地牢中发现了vegepygmies。另一个故事说，探险家们在一颗坠落的恒星留下的陨石坑中发现了赤霉菌，附近的茂密丛林中则有维格米人出没。

entries.name: Mold Begets Mold
entries: Vegepygmies originate from the remains left behind when a humanoid or a giant is killed by russet mold. One or more vegepygmies emerge from the corpse a day later. If a beast such as a dog or a bear dies from russet mold, the result is a bestial moldie called a thorny result instead of a humanoid-shaped vegepygmy. Thornies are less intelligent than vegepygmies, but have greater size and ferocity, as well as a thorn-covered body.

entries.name: Russet Mold
entries: 被称为赤褐色霉菌的真菌呈红褐色，只在黑暗、温暖和潮湿的地方发现。遍布金属物体的赤褐色霉菌会被误认为是天然的铁锈，在这种情况下，需要通过DC15智力（{@skill Nature}）或智慧（{@skill Survival}）检查来准确识别它。

任何在赤褐色霉菌5英尺范围内的生物都必须做一个DC13的宪法救赎，因为霉菌会发出一蓬孢子。如果拯救失败，该生物会变成（%0%）。在这样的情况下，该生物在每个回合开始时都会受到7({@damage 2d6})的毒药伤害，在受到伤害时发芽。该生物可以在其每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对自身的影响。任何能中和毒药或治疗疾病的魔法都会杀死虫害。被霉菌的毒药伤害减少到0点的生物会死亡。如果死亡的生物是野兽、巨人或人形，24小时后会有一个或多个新生的素食者从其身体中出现：一个新生的素食者来自小型尸体，两个来自中型尸体，四个来自大型尸体，八个来自巨大的尸体，或16个来自巨大的尸体。
赤霉病是很难杀死的，因为武器和大多数类型的伤害对它没有任何伤害。造成酸、坏死或辐射伤害的效果每造成1次伤害就会杀死1平方英尺的赤霉菌。一磅盐、一加仑酒精或治疗疾病的魔法效果可以杀死边长为10英尺的方形区域内的赤霉菌。阳光可以杀死光照范围内的任何赤霉菌。
Tlincallis，也被称为蝎子民，是一种被甲壳素覆盖的生物，从腰部往上是人形，下半身是巨大的蝎子，在长尾巴的末端有一根刺。

entries.name: Desert Nomads
entries: Tlincallis live austerely. They range across arid lands, hunting at dawn and dusk. In the hours between, they wait out the day's heat or the night's cold by burying themselves in loose sand or earth or, if the terrain proves too inflexible, lurking in ruins or shallow caves. A tribe of tlincallis stays in one place for only as long as the hunting is good in the immediate area, though they might visit the same way stations over and over during their wanderings. The tribe also settles down temporarily whenever it's time to lay eggs and hatch a new brood of young.

entries.name: Poisonous Eggs
entries: Tlincallis deposit their eggs in warm places out of direct sunlight, often amid a stand of cacti near their present encampment. There the eggs lie protected by hard shells coated in paralytic poison similar to that produced by their stingers. A would-be predator that dares to break an egg is defenseless against the tlincallis that come to investigate.

entries.name: Horrid Kidnappers
entries: Tlincallis eat what they kill, but they also take some of their prey alive when they have new mouths to feed. After using their stingers to paralyze victims and their spiked chains to bind them, tlincallis take these prisoners back to their encampment and tie them to cactus or rock formations. There, victims wait until the sun sets and the newly hatched young emerge from the lair to eat them alive.

entries.name: Prideful Hunters
entries: Tlincallis see themselves as great hunters. If a tlincalli tribe encounters a more powerful hunter, such as a blue dragon, the tribe's leader must decide whether the group becomes obedient to the superior hunter, moves on, or fights to the death to defeat it.

entries.name: Makeshift Weapons and Objects
entries: Tlincallis are uncivilized and don't build cities, make clothing, or mine metals. Instead, they scavenge what they need or want. They do, however, know how to melt down scavenged metal to forge crude weapons and tools.
转化者是拥抱变化、反对现状的专业魔法师，并将魔法转化视为通往财富、启蒙或神化的道路。
捕猎者是一种类似蝠鲼的生物，潜伏在地下和自然环境中。它可以改变其坚韧的、朝外的一面的颜色和质地，以帮助它与周围环境融为一体，而其柔软的、朝内的一面则依附在其狩猎区的地板、墙壁或天花板上。当它等待猎物靠近时，它保持不动。当目标在它触手可及的范围内时，它就把自己从表面剥离出来，包裹住猎物，将其压碎、闷死，然后消化掉。

entries.name: Versatile Camouflage
entries: A trapper can alter the color and texture of its outer side to match its surroundings. It can blend in with any surface made of stone, earth, or wood, masking its presence to any but the most rigorous scrutiny. It can't change its texture to that of a grassy or snow-covered surface, but it can change its color to match and then conceal itself under a thin layer of vegetation or actual snow.
捕猎者知道猎物何时靠近，所以以同样的戒心探索废墟和地牢。对于愚蠢的野兽来说，他们非常清楚什么是宝藏，什么是宝箱，以及这些宝箱如何引诱我们这些人。
-Volo

entries.name: Stationary Hunters
entries: A trapper needs to eat about a halfling-sized meal once a week to remain sated. It is content to stay in one place, given a steady supply of food, and thus trappers are a threat along any well-traveled dungeon corridor and on routes through the wilderness that see a lot of traffic. When prey is scarce, a trapper enters a state of hibernation that can last for months, though it is still aware when prey comes near. A trapper on the verge of starvation might defy its instincts and begin creeping along, abandoning its old territory in search of better hunting.

entries.name: Beware of Leftovers
entries: When its prey is dead, a trapper dissolves and absorbs the fleshy parts, leaving a scattering of bones, metal, treasure, and other indigestible bits in the place where the creature had been. A trapper that lurks on the floor of its hunting grounds can cover these remains with own body, making them look like irregularities in the surface. The creature might also attach itself to a wall or a ceiling close to a recent kill, effectively using the remnants as bait: a creature that stops to investigate the bones for valuables stands a good chance of becoming the trapper's next meal.
极少数情况下，来自长者大脑盐水池的蝌蚪会将一个人转化为乌利萨里德，一种更大、更有力的心灵传播者，拥有六条触手。

entries.name: Master Minds
entries: Illithids innately recognize that an ulitharid's survival is more important than their own. An elder brain's reaction to the rise of an ulitharid varies. In most colonies, the ulitharid becomes an elder brain's most favored servant, invested with power and authority. In others, the elder brain perceives an ulitharid as a potential rival for power, and it manipulates or quashes the ulitharid's ambitions accordingly.

entries.name: Birth of a Colony
entries: When an ulitharid finds sharing leadership with an elder brain to be insufferable, it breaks off from the colony, taking a group of mind flayers with it, and moves to another location to form a new colony. After the death of the ulitharid's body, mind flayers take its brain and place it in a brine pool, where it grows into an elder brain over a few days. This process doesn't work on the brain of an ulitharid that dies a natural death, as a brain that succumbs to old age is too decrepit to be used in the creation of an elder brain.

entries.name: Extractor Staff
entries: Each ulitharid carries a psionically enhanced staff made of black metal. When the ulitharid is ready to give up its life, it attaches the staff to the back of its head, and the staff cracks open its skull and peels it apart, enabling its brain to be extracted. The brain and the staff are then planted in the ulitharid's corpse, causing it to dissolve into ichor. This psionically potent slime helps to fuel the transformation of the area into a brine pool that surrounds an embryonic elder brain.
尖叫着，拍打着，面目狰狞--身体像被砍掉的头颅，蝙蝠般的翅膀代替了耳朵--马犼兽从深渊中沸腾出来，侵袭其他存在的星球，比如卡塞里，它们是一种威胁。每只马犼兽都携带一种疾病，可以创造出更多的同类；一群马犼兽展翅高飞，是一场等待发生的混乱和邪恶的瘟疫。

entries.name: Abyssal Nuisances
entries: Swarms of vargouilles flap through the caverns and skies of the Abyss. They are given little regard by powerful and intelligent demons since vargouilles can do them no harm. Even the weakest demon, such as a manes or a dretch, fears vargouilles only if they appear in great numbers. In the Lower Planes, vargouilles rarely get the chance to eat live prey other than vermin. More often, they lap up the ichor left behind when one fiend kills another.

恶魔之吻使一个人感染了可怕的诅咒。如果任其发展下去，诅咒会带来可怕的转变，因为深渊的灵魂会侵入这个人的身体。在几个小时内，受害者的头部会出现恶魔的特征，如獠牙、触角和角。同时，这个人的耳朵变大，扩大并转化为翅膀状的附属物。在最后的时刻，受害者的头在血泉中从身体上撕扯下来，成为另一个伏尔加人，然后经常急切地舔食自己的生命液体。阳光或{@spell daylight}法术的明亮照明可以延迟这种转变，因此马犼兽本能地回避亮光。

entries.name: The World Awaits
entries: Because of their instinctive hunger for living prey, vargouilles are eager to escape the Lower Planes. On rare occasions, the summoning of a demon to another plane can bring a vargouille along for the ride, attaching itself like a tick. The precautions a mortal takes to contain and control a summoned demon rarely account for a stowaway, and thus a vargouille enters the world unbidden.

entries.name: Ghastly Reproduction
entries: Vargouilles that roam free on the Material Plane are a dire threat to all creatures, especially humanoids. Their awful shrieking can paralyze other creatures with fear, and such victims are helpless to resist a vargouille's accursed kiss.

随着vegepygmy年龄的增长，它变得更加坚韧，并在其身上长出了孢子群。含有孢子的vegepygmies会受到其他vegepygmies的尊重，所以外人把这种vegepygmies称为首领。首领可以爆发性地排出它的孢子，感染附近的生物。如果一个生物在被感染时死亡，它的尸体会像赤霉病一样产生蔬果虫。
没有人知道赤霉病是怎么来的。有一个历史记载说，冒险家们在一个令人望而却步的山脉中发现了赤霉菌，并在一个充满奇特生命的金属地牢中发现了vegepygmies。另一个故事说，探险家们在一颗坠落的恒星留下的陨石坑中发现了赤霉菌，附近的茂密丛林中则有维格米人出没。

entries.name: Mold Begets Mold
entries: Vegepygmies originate from the remains left behind when a humanoid or a giant is killed by russet mold. One or more vegepygmies emerge from the corpse a day later. If a beast such as a dog or a bear dies from russet mold, the result is a bestial moldie called a thorny result instead of a humanoid-shaped vegepygmy. Thornies are less intelligent than vegepygmies, but have greater size and ferocity, as well as a thorn-covered body.

entries.name: Russet Mold
entries: 被称为赤褐色霉菌的真菌呈红褐色，只在黑暗、温暖和潮湿的地方发现。遍布金属物体的赤褐色霉菌会被误认为是天然的铁锈，在这种情况下，需要通过DC15智力（{@skill Nature}）或智慧（{@skill Survival}）检查来准确识别它。

任何在赤褐色霉菌5英尺范围内的生物都必须做一个DC13的宪法救赎，因为霉菌会发出一蓬孢子。如果拯救失败，该生物会变成（%0%）。在这样的情况下，该生物在每个回合开始时都会受到7({@damage 2d6})的毒药伤害，在受到伤害时发芽。该生物可以在其每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对自身的影响。任何能中和毒药或治疗疾病的魔法都会杀死虫害。被霉菌的毒药伤害减少到0点的生物会死亡。如果死亡的生物是野兽、巨人或人形，24小时后会有一个或多个新生的素食者从其身体中出现：一个新生的素食者来自小型尸体，两个来自中型尸体，四个来自大型尸体，八个来自巨大的尸体，或16个来自巨大的尸体。
赤霉病是很难杀死的，因为武器和大多数类型的伤害对它没有任何伤害。造成酸、坏死或辐射伤害的效果每造成1次伤害就会杀死1平方英尺的赤霉菌。一磅盐、一加仑酒精或治疗疾病的魔法效果可以杀死边长为10英尺的方形区域内的赤霉菌。阳光可以杀死光照范围内的任何赤霉菌。
这种有羽毛的恐龙大约有一只大火鸡那么大。它是一种好斗的捕食者，经常成群结队地捕食，以打倒较大的猎物。
战争祭司崇拜战争和战斗的神灵。他们计划战术，带领士兵作战，与敌人的施法者对抗，并照顾伤亡人员。战神可能会指挥军队或在战场上充当军阀的左右手。
大主教的术士们通过与精灵世界的领主签订魔法契约来获得他们的力量。这些术士通常与较小的精灵生物联系在一起，如boggles、quicklings、redcaps、satyrs和spirites。
恶魔术士通过与下层世界的大恶魔签订魔法契约来获得他们的力量。这些术士通常会把小恶魔或类人猿作为同伴，他们的行为趋于极端：与崇拜恶魔的邪教徒交往，或者把自己的生命献给毁灭恶魔的邪教。

monsterFluff.name: Warlock of the Great Old One

entries: 伟大的老一派术士通过与来自陌生而遥远的存在领域的长生实体缔结魔法契约来获得他们的力量。其中一些术士与致力于这些实体的邪教徒以及与他们目标相同的反常者有联系，然而其他伟大的老一派术士则是根除来自星际之外的怪异生物所激发的疯狂和邪恶的专家。
军阀是传奇性的战场指挥官，他们的名字被人们敬畏地提起。在取得一连串决定性的胜利后，军阀很容易扮演君主或将军的角色，并吸引愿意为他或她的旗帜牺牲的追随者。
木棉是一种强大的植物，呈人形，投入了一个放弃生命成为永恒守护者的灵魂。

entries.name: Born of Sacrifice
entries: The ritual to create a wood woad is a primeval secret passed down through generations of savage societies and dark druid circles. Performing the ritual isn't necessarily an act of evil, if the victim-to-be has entered into a bargain that requires it to be a willing sacrifice.
在这个仪式中，一个活人的胸部被刺穿，心脏被取出。然后将一粒种子推入心脏，并将其置于一棵树上。任何中空或弯曲的地方都可以，但通常在树干上刻出一个特殊的空洞。然后用牺牲者的血给树洗澡和浇水，并将尸体埋在树的根部。三天后，树底的地面上会冒出一个新芽，并迅速长成一个人形。
这个新的身体披着坚硬的树皮，带着虬结的棍棒和盾牌，立刻准备好履行它的职责。执行仪式的人让木头沃德执行任务，而这个生物则不停地遵循这些命令。
木头人被那些与自然有密切联系的生物所吸引，他们保护和尊重土地，例如德鲁伊和树人。一些树人凭借与德鲁伊或执行仪式的费伊的古老契约而拥有木棉的仆人，而其他树人则获得被释放的木棉的服务，这些木棉在同类守护者的领域中找到新的目标。

entries.name: Pitiless Protectors
entries: A wood woad has a hole where its heart would be, just as does the body of its former self, buried in the earth. Those who become wood woads trade their free will and all sense of sentiment for supernatural strength and a deathless duty. They exist only to protect woodlands and the people who tend them. A wood woad's face is void and expressionless, except for the motes of light that swim about in its eye sockets. Wood woads speak little, and when not being called upon to take action, they root themselves in the earth and silently take sustenance from it.

entries.name: Uprooted by Immortality
entries: Like a tree, a wood woad needs only sunlight, air, and nutrients from the earth to go on living. Because they are undying, some wood woads outlive their original purpose. The site a wood woad guards might lose its power or significance over time, or those whom it was assigned to guard might themselves die. If it is freed from its specific duties, a wood woad might roam to find another place of natural beauty or fey influence to watch over.
Xvarts是由一个懦弱的、叛逆的半神催生出来的残忍、懦弱的人形生物。他们有蓝色的皮肤，生动的橙色眼睛，发际线后退，反映了他们创造者的外表。他们大约有3英尺高。
Xvarts生活在偏远的山丘、森林和山洞中。每个部落都由一名演讲者领导，他通常是他们中最聪明的人。说话的人是部落的大使，他经常穿着短木跷和厚重的长袍，看起来更高大，更有威严。部落的其他成员以狩猎为生，如果狩猎不顺利，就从附近的农场掠夺农作物和牲畜。Xvarts对文明地区没有太大的威胁，因为他们对人类、矮人和精灵有些畏惧。

entries.name: Raxivort's Betrayal
entries: All xvarts are the degenerate offspring of an entity named Raxivort, who once served Graz'zt the Dark Prince as treasurer. Raxivort spent long centuries watching over the treasury, and in time he grew to lust after his master's riches. In one bold move, he plundered a treasure vault and fled to the Material Plane. One of the treasures he stole was the Infinity Spindle, a crystalline shard from the early days of the multiverse that could transform even a creature as low as Raxivort into a demigod.

在他成神之后，拉克西沃特在潘德摩斯的最顶层建立了一个名为 "黑色下水道 "的境界，这就是潘德摩斯。但他只是短暂地享受了他的神性升华，在格拉兹兹特释放出他的复仇之前。恶魔王子没有必要重新获得无限纺锤，因为他已经拥有了比它所能赋予的更大的力量。相反，他派遣特工到很远的地方去传播关于这个锭子能做什么的消息，以及声称拥有它的那个弱小、可怜的生物。很快，拉克西沃特就被各种敌人追捕，他们都渴望将转轴据为己有。
面对即将到来的毁灭，拉克西沃特制定了一个计划。逃到物质世界后，他在各种世界中徘徊，并产生了与他完全相同的生物。这些是xvarts，这些生物不仅在外观上与拉克西沃特一模一样，而且还能挫败任何用来追踪他的魔法。咒语、仪式和其他可以揭示拉克西沃特位置的效果都指向最近的xvarts。
虽然最初的敌人对他的冲击已经平息，但拉克西沃特知道，星球的力量是有耐心的。他仍然躲藏着，作为一个半神的可怜虫，他只是在各星球上游荡，产生更多的Xvarts以确保他的持续安全。
当事情进展不顺利时，他们就会绑架任何方便的人，并将其献给他们的疯狂之神。嗯。我想他们毕竟与很多人类没有什么不同。
-Volo

尽管他们生性糊涂，但所有的xvarts都对Raxivort有着不可动摇的奉献精神。取悦拉西沃特的愿望在他们所有的决定中占了很大比重。当事情进展不顺利时，Xvarts自然会认为Raxivort在生气。为了安抚他们麻烦的主人，他们策划了绑架事件。他们用网来捕捉敌人，然后把他们拖回巢穴，在一个临时的祭坛上献祭。拉克西沃特能听到他们的祈祷，但他在大多数时候都不敢出来。偶尔，他也会出现在崇拜者的部落面前，变成一个9英尺高的Xvart，拿着一个空袋子。在每一个这样的例子中，Raxivort都会拿走部落所积累的所有财宝，把它们塞进他的麻袋里，然后消失，不留下任何补偿。
Xvart扬声器
一个xvart部落有一个说话者，作为它的领袖。说话者拥有普通Xvart的统计数据，除了它的智力为13（+1），并且懂得一种额外的语言（通常是普通语言或哥布林语言）。

entries.name: Greedy Thugs
entries: Xvarts have all of their creator's flaws and few redeeming qualities. They lack the physical equipment to reproduce, as well as the inclination to do so. They are greedy, conniving, and obsessed with the acquisition of valuables-the more ornate or bizarre, the better. They know they are flawed, and this minor amount of self-awareness only magnifies their other deficiencies . They hate almost any creature they perceive as better than they are, which includes almost anyone, but they lack the courage or wherewithal to act on their hatred most of the time. Their fear has led them to dwell either in gloomy places on the far fringes of civilized lands or in areas neglected or forgotten by mightier creatures. In other words, xvarts usually live in places where normal vermin might flourish.

entries.name: Vermin Masters
entries: Rats and bats (including giant-sized specimens) are naturally attracted to xvarts, and xvarts domesticate such beasts for food and battle. Xvarts also form alliances with wererats, although the lycanthropes are dominant in any such arrangement. This relationship traces back to Raxivort's divine nature. Even though the xvarts inherited Raxivort's greed and cowardice, they also gained his ability to form bonds with such creatures.

entries.name: Xvart Warlocks
entries: A xvart can forge a pact with Raxivort by stealing an item of such great value that the demigod himself appears before the xvart to claim it. After surrendering the item to Raxivort, the xvart asks for magical power so that it can find and deliver more great treasures into Raxivort's custody. If the demigod feels so inclined, he imbues the xvart with greater wisdom and charisma and grants it the spellcasting abilities of a warlock before returning to the howling chaos of

entries.name: Pandemonium
entries: Raxivort's warlocks are respected and feared in xvart society, but they have little interest in political power. They scour the wilderness, old ruins, and dungeons for treasures, often with a handful of xvart sycophants and giant rat bodyguards in tow.

猎犬是由强大的精灵授予那些取悦他们的人，它们像猎狗一样为邪恶的主人服务。耶斯猎犬飞快地追赶它们的猎物，常常等到猎物精疲力竭而无法反击。只有在黎明的威胁下，猎狗群才会重新躲藏起来。

entries.name: Minions of a Dark Master
entries: A pack of yeth hounds can be created by powerful fey such as the Queen of Air and Darkness. Once it is brought into existence, a pack must have a master, who is often someone the creator wishes to reward. The master can telepathically communicate with its yeth hounds to give them commands from afar. If the master of a pack is killed, the hounds seek and choose a new master, typically an individual of great evil such as a vampire, a necromancer, or a hag.
耶斯猎犬肩高约5英尺，体重约400磅。在黑暗中，往往只能看到它的眼睛在夜黑的皮毛下发出红色的光芒。猎犬的头部有一张类似人类的脸，由比狗更灵活的脖子支撑着。这种生物散发出一种像烟一样的气味。
那些站在原地反击的人发现，世俗的武器会部分穿过猎犬，就像它是由雾组成的一样，但魔法武器和银色的武器却能真正击中。

entries.name: Sound of Looming Death
entries: Yeth hounds make a ghastly baying sound that can be heard all around. Creatures that can see a hound when it bays are filled with supernatural fear and usually flee in terror. When a victim tries to run away, a hound delights in chasing after it and tormenting it before bringing the hunt to a close.

entries.name: Foiled by Sunlight
entries: Yeth hounds can't stand sunlight. A pack never willingly prolongs a hunt beyond the night hours and always seeks to return to its dark den before the first rays of dawn. No amount of coercion by a pack's master can deter this behavior. If a yeth hound is exposed to natural sunlight, it fades away, vanishing into the Ethereal Plane, from where its master can retrieve it only after the sun has set.
成为某个特定神灵的祭司信徒的元帝马利森--无论是赛斯、夜蛇丹达，还是梅尔索尔克--往往会通过等级晋升，成为蛇人中的精神领袖。这些祭司举行祭祀仪式来安抚他们卑鄙的神。

entries.name: Yuan-ti Anathema
entries: 憎恶对成神的追求可能会导致它进行一种仪式，如果成功的话，它就会变成一种更伟大的形式：憎恶的元神。这个仪式要求牺牲数百条蛇，并要求憎恶在其敌人的血液中沐浴。这种转变是快速而痛苦的。
并非所有的元老都渴望看到他们自己的人成为憎恶者，因为憎恶者为了他们自己的邪恶目的而残酷地征服他们的下级。

entries.name: Not Quite Divine
entries: An anathema considers itself a demigod on the path to greater divinity. It demands obeisance from weaker yuan-ti and uses every resource at its disposal to launch small-scale wars against its neighbors. Each conquest brings new slaves and sacrifices, as well as glory and riches, that the anathema thinks it needs to achieve true divinity.
无神论者最忠诚的元神追随者将其视为蛇形的巅峰之作，是对近乎完美的憎恶的不可思议的改进。它忠实的人类追随者认为它是 "凡人身体里的神圣肉体"，而为无神论者服务的邪教徒在它面前往往会更加嗜血和自我牺牲。

entries.name: Immortal
entries: Anathemas don't age, allowing them to pursue their goals until the end of days. Truly powerful ones can grow to rule multiple yuan-ti cities and bring entire regions, including humanoid realms, under yuan-ti control.
成为某个特定神灵的祭司信徒的元帝马利森--无论是赛斯、夜蛇丹达，还是梅尔索尔克--往往会通过等级晋升，成为蛇人中的精神领袖。这些祭司举行祭祀仪式来安抚他们卑鄙的神。

entries.name: Yuan-ti Broodguard
entries: Broodguards是被元帝改造成头脑简单、有鳞片的生物，为其主人服务的人。转化过程不仅扭曲了主体的身体，也扭曲了它的思想，使它本能地服从任何元帝，并在看到非爬行动物时充满了愤怒。
虽然护雏员的智力较低，但他们能够在社区中执行简单而重要的任务，如看守鸡蛋或巡逻防止入侵者。元氏族人将护雏员称为 "histachii"，意思是 "看蛋的人"。

entries.name: Human No More
entries: Most broodguards are made from human prisoners forced to consume a magical brew that renders them helpless and unable to fight off the inevitable. A human transformed into a broodguard loses all semblance of who it once was, and even its human origin is barely discernible. A broodguard is hairless and emaciated, with yellow-green, scaly skin. It has beady, bloodshot eyes and a forked tongue, and smells faintly of rotting meat. Broodguards can speak but rarely do so, preferring to use snake-like hisses and guttural noises.

entries.name: Making a Broodguard
entries: 元帝用被俘的人类制造护卫。每个对象都会被喂食一种特殊的药水，这种药水会立即使其变成{@condition incapacitated}，并在接下来的{@dice 1d6 + 6}天内将其转化为一个守夜人。被迫喝下这种药水的人可以做一个DC15的体质测试，如果成功，就会受到14（%2%）的毒药伤害，但不会受到其他影响。
诸如 "较小的恢复 "或 "消除诅咒 "之类的法术可以在转化过程进行之前的任何时候结束它。在这个过程完成后，只有{@spell wish}的法术可以逆转这个效果。

entries.name: Yuan-ti Malison Variants: Types 4 and 5
entries: 马利森是一种融合了人类和蛇类特征的元神。在《怪物手册》中描述了三种不同类型的马利森，这里还描述了两种比较罕见的类型。4型和5型马利森是马利森种群中等级最低的成员，这两种类型的元神都没有毒。
成为某个特定神灵的祭司信徒的元帝马利森--无论是赛斯、夜蛇丹达，还是梅尔索尔克--往往会通过等级晋升，成为蛇人中的精神领袖。这些祭司举行祭祀仪式来安抚他们卑鄙的神。

entries.name: Yuan-ti Mind Whisperer
entries: 心灵低语者是与蛇神塞斯（Sseth）签订契约的恶意咒语者，塞斯是死神的代言人。他们利用自己的能力使他人皈依他们的信仰，增加他们的个人力量，并迷惑敌人的思想。
一个心语者是难以捉摸的、操纵的、不可预测的，并且愿意欺骗或杀死同志和对手，如果这样做有利于它的话。赛斯的崇拜者在许多计划中都有他们的参与，他们经常在两个派别的中间地带活动，因此花了很多精力来确保他们的盟友都不知道他们之间的冲突关系。即使在元老中，心语者也以自视甚高、鬼鬼祟祟、一有麻烦就容易逃跑而闻名。
这种马利森是有人类身体和蛇头的类型。
成为某个特定神灵的祭司信徒的元帝马利森--无论是赛斯、夜蛇丹达，还是梅尔索尔克--往往会通过等级晋升，成为蛇人中的精神领袖。这些祭司举行祭祀仪式来安抚他们卑鄙的神。

entries.name: Yuan-ti Nightmare Speaker
entries: 说梦话的人是女性元老级马利森祭司，她们与夜蛇丹达（Dendar）达成协议，用受害者的恐惧和噩梦来喂养她们的神灵，以换取凡人世界的权力。女祭司从丹达那里得到噩梦般的幻觉，并将其解释为预言，然后利用她们的魔法和影响力使这些幻觉成真。
梦魇者是所有元老中最残忍的，他们喜欢折磨囚犯和奴隶，让他们持续处于恐惧和害怕的状态。他们更喜欢恐吓而不是杀死他们的对手。他们为了获得更多的受害者而操纵人形社区，并喜欢与亡灵为伍。
这种马利森是具有人类头部和上半身的类型，下半身是蛇形的，而不是腿。
成为某个特定神灵的祭司信徒的元帝马利森--无论是赛斯、夜蛇丹达，还是梅尔索尔克--往往会通过等级晋升，成为蛇人中的精神领袖。这些祭司举行祭祀仪式来安抚他们卑鄙的神。

entries.name: Yuan-ti Pit Master
entries: 坑主是元老级的马利森祭司，他们与默尔绍尔克神达成了协议，并试图通过向他献祭人形生物来唤醒他的沉睡。他们是元老中最传统的态度，并相信他们最有能力实现其人民的目标。
坑道主人深入参与了该种族接管类人政府的长期计划，以及保护他们的城市不被发现或被敌方攻击的持续努力。他们反对鲁莽的行为，主张在所有事务中采取缓慢、谨慎的方法。
这种马利森是有一个人头和身体，手臂是蛇的类型。
